T09gopjatmu:1: von Hahn nach der Publ. von 1981 noch verbessert.
T09gopjatmu:2: 1. Ajātaśatru mahānti pāpāny abhibhūya yasmād ajātaśatrur guṇavān babhūva |
T09gopjatmu:3: upetya sadbhiḥ saha saṃprayogam ato niṣevyā guṇavanta eva || GoAś_1 ||
T09gopjatmu:4: aho vibhūtir guṇavistarāṇāṃ guṇābdhikair yat saha saṃprayujya |
T09gopjatmu:5: guṇair abhūtair viguṇo 'bhyupeti guṇaprasiddhiṃ guṇabhūṣaneṣu || GoAś_2 ||
T09gopjatmu:6: abhūtasaṃbhāvanayā tayā tu hato 'py asau kālavaśena bhūpaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:8: svabhāvasaṃsiddhir iyaṃ tathā hi janasya sadvṛttiniratyayasya |
T09gopjatmu:9: vijihmabhāveṣv api yat prayāti guṇaprasiddheḥ khalu hetubhāvam || GoAś_4
T09gopjatmu:10: bravīmy ato 'haṃ narake 'pi vāso varaṃ sphuradvahniśikhākarāle |
T09gopjatmu:11: na caiva sanmitranirākṛtasya sureśvarāṇāṃ sukhasaṃpado 'pi || GoAś_5 ||
T09gopjatmu:12: tadyathānuśrūyate rājā kilājātaśatrur vanadviradavaropagrahanimittaṃ svanagarād abhiniḥsṛtya dadarśa mahāntaṃ kuñjaravaraṃ vanābhimukham abhidravantam |
T09gopjatmu:13: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tam eva hastinam anujagāma |
T09gopjatmu:14: sa ca dantī smṛtvā sarāṃsi kamalotpalamaṇḍitāni kādambapakṣapavanoddhataśīkarāṇi |
T09gopjatmu:18: uddhūtaśīkarakaro dvirado vanānāṃ tūrṇaṃ yayau pavananunna ivāmbugarbhaḥ
T09gopjatmu:19: atha sa mahīpatiḥ pavanapaṭujavātiśayaturagavarādhirūḍho dūrād apasṛtabalasahāyo na cireṇa khadirabadarabilveṅgudādikaṇṭakadrumavanagahanāṃ śaravaṇakāśakuśavaṃśajālajaṭiladuḥsaṃcārapradeśāṃ jīrṇaśīrṇavikṣiptāsthikaṅkālaśakaladhavalabhūmibhāgāṃ pratibhayagambhīraśvabhraprapātasthalasthāṇuvalmīkadurnirgamapraveśām aṭavīṃ prapede |
T09gopjatmu:20: sa ca gajādhipatis tasya rājño darśanam apajagāma |
T09gopjatmu:25: ekākī sa nṛpo bhraman ravikarajvālāpratāpāturas tṛṣṇārtaḥ padavīṃ dadarśa sahasā śailendrasaṃprāpikām tāṃ ca muhūrtam anugacchan dadarśa dūrād eva nīlavipulasnigdhapalāśanicitaviṭapataruvaragahanam acalasānupradeśam |
T09gopjatmu:27: asmin nūnaṃ pradeśe navanalinavanacchannatoyaṃ saro vā dhārā śailodarād vā patati maṇidalasvacchaśobhā jalasya |
T09gopjatmu:28: vṛkṣās tatsaṃnikarṣād upacitavipulaśyāmaśākhāpraśākhā yenaite śailam etaṃ jagad iva sakalaṃ sajjanāḥ śobhayanti || GoAś_10 ||
T09gopjatmu:31: ete vṛddhim upāgatāḥ khalu parām āsādya toyāśayaṃ sanmitraṃ samupetya sādhava iva pradhvasyamānārayaḥ tad ito gacchāmīti saṃpradhāryopetya ca taṃ pradeśaṃ samantato vilokayan dadarśānyatamasmin taruvaragahanavivare + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +

T09gopjatmu:37: atha sa rājā tam upadiṣṭaṃ salilāśayam upagamya vigatapipāsāklamapari +
T09gopjatmu:39: pītvāpi vāri kamalotpalanālaśītaṃ tīvraklamāturamanā na dhṛtiṃ jagāma ||
T09gopjatmu:40: atha sa bhikṣuḥ sāndrakaruṇāmṛtarasārdraśītalena cakṣuṣā taṃ rājānam abhisamīkṣyābravīt |
T09gopjatmu:46: dagdhāpi bhū ravikaraiḥ sphuṭadīptimadbhir dandahyate gataghṛṇena davānalena |
T09gopjatmu:49: kalyāṇamitravikalās tu vicāraśūnyā rāgātmakā iva narāḥ pramadāvilāsaiḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:50: gharmāturo bhayam anāgatam apradhārya cchāyāṃ samāśrayati bhogiphaṇasya bhekaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:54: ete gajā ravikarotkaratāpiteṣu naiva sthaleṣu na jaleṣu dhṛtiṃ labhante |
T09gopjatmu:55: grāmeṣu puṣpavikaceṣu ca kānaneṣu pāriplavālpamatayo yatayo yathaiva ||
T09gopjatmu:60: vismṛtya pūrvaparibhogasukhāny anāryā veśyā viluptadhanasāram ivālpasattvam || GoAś_19 ||
T09gopjatmu:61: dāvāgnibhasmaparuṣaiḥ pavanair udastam etad bhramaty avirataṃ taruparṇacakram |
T09gopjatmu:62: utpīḍyamānam aniśaṃ niravagraheṇa saṃsāracakram iva karmasamīraṇena ||
T09gopjatmu:63: paryanteṣu sphuṭitaśakalacchedasaṃparkarūkṣas toyābhyāśe srutajalatayā na dravo nātiśuṣkaḥ
T09gopjatmu:64: kiṃciccheṣākaluṣasalilāplāvito madhyabhāge paṅkaḥ śoṣaṃ sphuritaśapharījālagarbhaḥ prayāti kiṃciccheṣavivarṇaparṇaśabalā mūle kaṭhorāruṇā mandaśyāmapalāśasaṃcayavatī madhye samārdracchaviḥ
T09gopjatmu:65: gharmaśyāmavibhugnapallavadalā prānte latā nartakī mlāniṃ yāty aniśaṃ kalāv iva yuge satpauruṣī dharmatā || GoAś_22 ||
T09gopjatmu:66: chattrair vyabhraśaśāṅkamaṇḍalasitai ratnaprabhābhāsvarair vikṣiptāḥ kiraṇā yad asya bahuśo niryāṇakāle mama |
T09gopjatmu:67: tad vairaṃ hṛdayena saṃcitam ayaṃ nūnaṃ vahaty aṃśumān yasyāgnir dahatīva durjanavacas tīkṣṇair mayūkhāṅkuraiḥ || GoAś_23 ||
T09gopjatmu:68: atha sa bhikṣuḥ kathāntaravivakṣayā smitam āviścakāra |
T09gopjatmu:69: + + + + sa rājā samantato nirīkṣyānyam anīkṣamāṇo mām evādhikṛtya pravrajitena smitam ādarśitam iti viniścitya kutūhalākrāntamatis tam abravīt ||
T09gopjatmu:70: vinayadhīram idaṃ ca vapus tava smitam idaṃ ca bhadanta vidhāryate |
T09gopjatmu:71: calati buddhir iyaṃ pavanāhatā vanalateva kim atra nu kāraṇam || GoAś_24
T09gopjatmu:72: atha sa pārthivaḥ sutarām upajātavimarśasaṃbhramodbhrāntamānasaḥ punar api taṃ bhikṣuṃ smitaprayojanaṃ paryapṛcchat |
T09gopjatmu:73: sa ca bhikṣus tadupakārakāmatayaiva rājñaḥ provāca ||
T09gopjatmu:74: sūryātapo dahati vatsa śarīrakaṃ te tasmāt sukhocitam idaṃ tu roganīḍam |
T09gopjatmu:77: duḥkhaṃ tv anāgatam avīcisamudbhavaṃ te nāśaṃ prayāsyati narādhipa kair upāyaiḥ || GoAś_26
T09gopjatmu:78: prāṇoparodhasamakālam avaśyabhāvi yat prāpsyasi tvam akṛtajña bahuprakāram
T09gopjatmu:79: duḥkhaṃ yadā kṣaṇaya – ⏑ ⏑ – ⏑ – – – t tava tadgajabhayā ⏑ ⏑ – kṣaṇena ||
T09gopjatmu:80: karmendhanaḥ sphurati tatra (?) sadā hutāśo durvṛttaśoṇitavasāsavapānaśauṇḍaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:81: yo bāndhavān iva pariṣvajate pragāḍhaṃ jvālābhujair aviralaiḥ svakṛtāparādhān || GoAś_28 ||
T09gopjatmu:82: vīciṃ vadanti vivaraṃ na ca tatra kā cid duḥkhasya vīcir api tiryag upary adho vā |
T09gopjatmu:83: yasmād avīcir iti tena ca saṃprasiddhaḥ śīrṇas tanoti bhavano narakāntareṣu || GoAś_29 ||
T09gopjatmu:85: sa tvaṃ vyathām upagato raviraśmitapto hārād bibheṣi na tu ghoraviṣād bhujaṅgat || GoAś_30
T09gopjatmu:87: premṇā yenākaruṇahṛdayo vardhitaḥ pālitaś ca taṃ tvaṃ hatvā yadi na patitas tatkṣaṇaṃ citram etat || GoAś_31 ||
T09gopjatmu:88: bālye lālāsalilamalinaṃ pāṇinā vaktrapadmaṃ yenāmṛṣṭaṃ vikacakamalacchedatāmrodareṇa |
T09gopjatmu:89: tvāṃ kṛtvāṅke kṛpaṇa bhavataḥ kuñcitāḥ kākapakṣā ye – – – ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ – – ⏑ – – ⏑ – – || GoAś_32
T09gopjatmu:90: sa tvaṃ hatvā pitaram api te dhārmikaṃ dharmarājaṃ kāmāsvādavyasanamadirāpānavikṣiptacittaḥ
T09gopjatmu:91: svasthāvasthaś carasi narakadvāraśālāṃ praviṣṭo jvālāhastair narakaśikhinaḥ spraṣṭum icchanti hi tvām || GoAś_33 ||
T09gopjatmu:92: jvaladanalaśīkhāvalīpiṅgalāntaḥsthalaṃ sarvatas tuṅganiḥsaṅganiśchidralohādrijālāvṛtacchinnasaṃbhinnasaṃvignasaṃkūjitotkṛṣṭaniṣpiṣṭaniṣpīḍitotkṣiptavikṣiptaluptāvaluptāśrayaprāṇisaṃghākulabhīṣaṇaṃ kṛpaṇaka narakaṃ padā yāsyasi prerito dāruṇaiḥ karmavātair anekograduḥkhaprakarṣātisaṃtāpito dīnakaṇṭho ⏑ – ūrdhvabāhur jvalacchūlacakrāsikuntaprahāravraṇodvāntaraktokṣitas tatra cākāmakaḥ saṃvasan |
T09gopjatmu:93: jvaladanalakamaṇḍalākoṭarastabdhanetraiḥ sphuratkopasaṃdaṣṭadantacchadair udyatāgrāyudhair antakājñākarais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti nistarjito bhītabhīto diśaḥ prekṣamāṇaḥ sthito 'smīti kṛcchrād abhivyāharan kām avasthām abhiprāpsyasi tvaṃ dhṛto duṣkṛtaiḥ karmabhir
T09gopjatmu:94: yadi samanuvicārayet tad bhavān nūnam – – ⏑ – – ⏑ pādopamāḥ syur nidāghe
T09gopjatmu:95: 'titīvrā amī bhūpate na tv anabhyāhatā yānti saṃvegam ajñā janāḥ prāyaśo duḥkhayantrāntarasthās tu śocanti moghaṃ pralāpārtiśokābhibhūtā bhṛśam ||
T09gopjatmu:98: saṃdaṃśayantravivṛtāsyapuṭāntarālas tāmraṃ kathaṃ kathaya pāsyasi vahnivarṇam || GoAś_35 ||
T09gopjatmu:100: klinnasvinnanarāsthipañjaravasāniryāsaparyākule tapte vaitaraṇījale nipatito duḥkhāt kadā mokṣyase || GoAś_36 ||
T09gopjatmu:101: prāsāde śaradabhraśubhraśikhare puṣpāvalīmaṇḍite vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgagītamadhure saṃprāpya citraṃ sukham |
T09gopjatmu:102: nityaṃ prajvalitasphuṭānalaśikhāsaṃtānajālākulaṃ prāpyāvīcim anekaduḥkhavihataḥ kiṃ nāma kartā bhavān || GoAś_37 ||
T09gopjatmu:103: lajjāmātravibhūṣaṇāṃ savinayāṃ cārūpacārāṃ priyāṃ dṛṣṭvā prītivijṛmbhamāṇanayano viśrambhaniryantraṇām
T09gopjatmu:105: śrīmaccāmaracārubhāsuranarair nānāvidhair vājibhiḥ kāliṅgaiś ca vicitritottarakuthair gandhopavāhyair gajaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:107: – – – ⏑ ⏑ ke viśīrṇacaraṇo voḍhāsi dīptān rathān || GoAś_39 ||
T09gopjatmu:108: dhṛtaś cūḍāpīḍo bakulakusumāmodasubhagas tvayā mūrdhnā yena sphuṭamaṇikarālaṃ ca mukuṭam |
T09gopjatmu:109: sphuradvahnijvālāvalayakapilaṃ cakram aśivaṃ vahan mūrdhnā tena tvam anubhavitā cāpalaphalam kiṃ ca bhūyaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:110: kaler ājñābhaṅgo bhavati sucirāj janmasamaye muner yasya prāṇipriyahitasamādhānaviduṣaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:111: jagannāthe tasmin bhagavati bhavopadravahare praduṣṭānāṃ kā vā bhavatu gatir anyā param ataḥ unmīlitā iva diśo daśa yasya dīptaiḥ kīrtyaṃśubhir ghanatamaḥpaṭalāvanaddhāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:112: tasmin pradoṣam upagacchati yas tapasvī svair eva karmabhir asau prahataḥ kṣatātmā || GoAś_42
T09gopjatmu:113: yo māteva piteva bāndhava iva prāṇiṣv anukrośavān ātmasnehaparāṅmukhena manasā janmāṭavīgahvare
T09gopjatmu:114: prajñāvīryakṛpābhyupāyasacivaḥ kleśair anākampitaḥ prāpto bodhim anuttarāṃ sa bhagavān kāṃ satkriyāṃ nārhati || GoAś_43 ||
T09gopjatmu:116: manaḥprasādāyatane 'pi tasmin kathaṃ nu cittāni vidūṣayanti || GoAś_44 ||
T09gopjatmu:117: asajjanasamāgamasya kaṭukāvasānaṃ phalaṃ narendra samupasthitaṃ tad adhunā tavāpāyikam |
T09gopjatmu:118: idaṃ samanucintya sādhujanasaṃgamaḥ sevyatāṃ tatas tava bhaviṣyati vyasanapañjarān nirgamaḥ evaṃ gate 'pi kriyatām prayatnaḥ pāpaprahāṇe kuśalodaye ca |
T09gopjatmu:119: apy eva nāma vyasanāmburāśeḥ syāt te 'vasānaṃ naralokapāla || GoAś_46 ||
T09gopjatmu:121: narendralakṣmīm upaguhya pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā duḥkhaśatāvasānam || GoAś_47 ||
T09gopjatmu:123: viṣajya kāmeṣu manas tvayātmā svayaṃ kṛto durgatiduḥkhasākṣī || GoAś_48 ||
T09gopjatmu:124: abhisandhikṛtasya karmaṇo na hi nāśaṃ pravadanti sūrayaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:125: api kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ phaladaṃ tan niyamena jāyate || GoAś_49 ||
T09gopjatmu:126: ata eva jagau jagadvaro jagadālokakaraḥ kṛpāmayaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:127: bhagavān bhavabhoganiḥspṛhaḥ sa hi karmasvakatāṃ śarīriṇām || GoAś_50 ||
T09gopjatmu:129: prabhavanti tu tena karmaṇā svam ataḥ karma nṛṇāṃ śubhāśubham || GoAś_51
T09gopjatmu:131: maraṇābhimukho yadā naro nanu karmaiva tadā parāyaṇam || GoAś_52 ||
T09gopjatmu:133: svakṛtaṃ tv anuyāti dehināṃ bhavasaṃkrāntyanukūlavartinām || GoAś_53 ||
T09gopjatmu:135: maraṇavaśagatasya jantor vivṛddholbaṇaśvāsaśuṣkauṣṭhakaṇṭhasya hikkāpraveśānubandhād vinirdhūyamānorasaḥ kalavikalapadākṣare bhāṣite vihvale cakṣuṣi cchidyamāneṣu marmasv anāmantrya roṣād iva prasthitair vāyubhiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:137: nipātāntare kvāpi gantuṃ kṛtābhyudyame jīvite timiragahanasaṃkaṭaṃ nirjanaṃ mārgam ākrāmato nāsti puṇyād ṛte kaś cid anyaḥ sakhā tat prayatnaṃ kuru śreyasi || GoAś_54 ||
T09gopjatmu:139: avaśyaṃ tyaktavyaḥ paramadayito bāndhavajanaḥ praveṣṭavyaṃ ghoraṃ sabhayam asahāyena gahanam
T09gopjatmu:140: pravāse vastavyaṃ suciram api cāsaṃstutajane tad asmāt kartavyaṃ bahukuśalapātheyam asakṛt atha sa rājā tena bhikṣuṇā tathā saṃvejito yathā kṣaṇenopalabdhakuśalamūlopacayābhilāṣas tīvrabhayaviṣādavyākulamānasaś ca provāca ||
T09gopjatmu:141: tad adhunā karavāṇi bhadanta he vada vadāsti dayā yadi te mayi |
T09gopjatmu:142: nipatitaṃ mahati vyasanārṇave kṛpaṇakaṃ kṛpayoddhara māṃ yate || GoAś_56
T09gopjatmu:143: jaladamārutacandanaśītalair api vayaṃ vacanais tava tāpitāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:146: samupaguhya kṛtaṃ bahu duṣkṛtaṃ dahati yan mama saṃprati mānasam ||
T09gopjatmu:147: dhig avaraṃ viṣamaṃ viṣayāśrayaṃ sukham anāryaniṣevitam adhruvam |
T09gopjatmu:148: yad upagamya narā viṣayadviṣām iha bhavanti sadā karuṇāspadam || GoAś_59
T09gopjatmu:149: avinayo 'nugato mṛditaṃ yaśo na gaṇitaṃ kulam āyatir ujjhitā |
T09gopjatmu:152: śaṭhamatibhir anāryair vipralabdho 'smi vākyair yad iha guṇadhanānāṃ śocanīyo 'smi jātaḥ || prakṛtiruciravṛttāḥ sādhavo nānuvṛttāḥ suca ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ mānāṃ vāṅmadhūnāṃ nimittam |
T09gopjatmu:155: viṣayasukhalavāśāpāśam āmucya citte tṛṇalavam iva jīrṇaṃ projjhya sadvṛttavantam |

T09gopjatmu:157: – – – ⏑ ⏑ – ⏑ – ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ – bhūyo 'pi māṃ dhakṣyati proddhūtākulalolapiṅgalaśikho vahniḥ kathaṃ nārakaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:158: pāpātmā mṛta eva nāma satataṃ yo 'nyo 'pi vāsmadvidho mṛtyuḥ kiṃ mṛtamārikām akaruṇaḥ kartuṃ vyavasyen mayi || GoAś_64 ||
T09gopjatmu:159: diksaṃmoham upāgato 'ham adhunā gacchāmi kāṃ vā diśaṃ majjāmīva bhadanta śokasarasi vyā śailo 'yaṃ sphuṭatīva pāpacaritaṃ mām adya saṃdhārayan yuṣmatpādasamāśrayāt tu śatadhā na tv eva yāti dhruvam || GoAś_65 ||
T09gopjatmu:160: atha sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ saṃvignamānasam avetya pātram ayaṃ śreyasa iti vinirdhāryovāca
T09gopjatmu:161: tena hi mahārāja tam eva bhagavantaṃ vinipāta ...

T09gopjatmu:165: sukṣetre bījam uptaṃ bhavati bahuphalaṃ tiktam āsyapriyaṃ vā kṣetrasyāsau svabhāvo bhavati samaguṇaḥ sarvasasyaprasūtau |

T09gopjatmu:367: yo na nirdahati pāpakāriṇīṃ kakṣamuṣṭim iva māṃ hatatrapām || GoBhl_70 ||
T09gopjatmu:368: vitataśikhikalāpodbhāsurālokajālaṃ nipatati mama vajraṃ sāṃprataṃ kiṃ tu mūrdhni |
T09gopjatmu:369: sutam akaruṇacittā yāham evaṃ tyajāmi stanarasaparibhogaklībavaktrāravindam || GoBhl_71 ||
T09gopjatmu:370: ity evam anyathā ca tasyā vilapantyāḥ kiṃciccheṣā rajanī babhūva |
T09gopjatmu:372: jñāyatāṃ tāvad bhadre kim avaśeṣaṃ niśāyā iti |
T09gopjatmu:374: svāmini saṃprati hi aruṇakiraṇamālāpāṭalopāntalekhaṃ praviralataratāraṃ khaṃ parāvṛttacandram
T09gopjatmu:375: pulinam iva payodher vidrumakṣodatāmraṃ parimukulapalāśasvasthasaṃsuptahaṃsam || GoBhl_72
T09gopjatmu:378: durjātaṃ mama mandāyā gaccha cchoraya bālakam || GoBhl_73 ||
T09gopjatmu:379: ity uktvā sā bāṣpavegoparudhyamānahṛdayā pṛthivyāṃ sahasā nipapāta |
T09gopjatmu:381: sā tatheti pratiśrutya tam ādāya tapasvinam |
T09gopjatmu:383: putrakrauryaṃ vivṛtam aśivaṃ janmaduḥkhopataptaṃ bhartṛsnehaḥ ciraparicayād baddhamūlo na dṛṣṭaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:384: dagdhaṃ vaṃśadvayam api mayā durnayāṅgāravarṣair hā kāmānāṃ prakṛtir asatī sarvaduḥkhaprasūtiḥ nāsau rurāvāmuṣitasmṛtitvāc cukopa mātre na ca tattvadarśī |
T09gopjatmu:385: dṛṣṭvā tu tām ātmagatām avasthāṃ svam eva cittaṃ vinininda bālaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:386: nāyaṃ jananyā mama kāmacāro na cānimittaṃ vyasanaṃ mamedam |
T09gopjatmu:387: svayaṃ kṛtāni vyasanāny amūni tvayaiva me citta vimuñca dainyam ||
T09gopjatmu:389: bhavopabhogeṣv adhunā viṣādaṃ kim eva mohād asamīkṣyakārin || GoBhl_78 ||
T09gopjatmu:390: hitaiṣiṇas tasya vaco 'vadhīrya tvam ajña nirdagdhapunarbhavasya |
T09gopjatmu:391: bibheṣi duḥkhād adhunā kim evaṃ svakarmanirmāṇam idaṃ tavaiva || GoBhl_79
T09gopjatmu:392: na pūjayanti pratipattibhir ye giro gurūṇām anukampakānām |
T09gopjatmu:393: imāni cānyāni ca te labhante viṣādanīnāṃ vipadāṃ śatāni || GoBhl_80 ||
T09gopjatmu:394: yathā yathā tīvradvandvopanipātajāni duḥkhāny anubhavati sma tathā tathā sutarām upajāyamānasaṃvegaḥ sāśrukaṇṭha eva śuśoca viklavātmā tapasvī |
T09gopjatmu:395: praviralatṛṇacchannaśvabhraprapātabhayaṃkarān mama gurur asau tyaktvā yāto bhavābdhikadurbhavān
T09gopjatmu:396: tanusukhalavakliṣṭātmāno vayaṃ tu hatatrapā bhavajalanidher dṛṣṭvāpy antaṃ punar nidhanaṃ gatāḥ || GoBhl_81 ||
T09gopjatmu:397: matihutabhujā dagdhvā skandhapravṛttiviṣadrumaṃ sthitiṣu vaśitāṃ saṃprāpyāpi prakāśayaśotsavāḥ
T09gopjatmu:398: sakalabhuvanaśreyaḥ kṛtvā gatāḥ sugatāḥ śamaṃ viṣayakṛpaṇāḥ kaṣṭaṃ naṣṭā vayaṃ bhavalubdhakāḥ sthānāsthānavivekayogaviduṣā sthānena saṃvarṇitā skandhānāṃ kṣaṇikāpy anuttaragirā nirvṛttir āyāsinī |
T09gopjatmu:399: sthāne prajvalitāṃs tarūn iva khagās tyaktvā bhavān bhaṅgurān nirvānti jvalanā ivāmbuvihatāś citteśvarā yoginaḥ || GoBhl_83 ||
T09gopjatmu:400: kṛtvābhiyogam api cāgamagahvareṣu svairapracāram anugṛhya mano manuṣyāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:401: alpaśrutā iti jagaty upayānti saṃkhyāṃ cetovinigrahaphalaṃ śrutam āhur āryāḥ || GoBhl_84 ||
T09gopjatmu:402: sa sūcikāgrair iva tudyamānaḥ pipīlikair bhugnakarāladaṃṣṭraiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:403: mahīrajodhūsarakomalāṅgo muhur muhuḥ saṃparivartate sma || GoBhl_85 ||
T09gopjatmu:404: sa makṣikāṇāṃ nayutaiḥ parīto mṛduḥ prayatnākulapāṇipādaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:405: viceṣṭamānaḥ karuṇaṃ kathaṃ cid bhavān jagarhe manasānutāpī || GoBhl_86 ||
T09gopjatmu:406: krūrārāvaiḥ purabalibhujāṃ maṇḍalaiḥ saṃpatadbhir vyādhūtāsyo vipadam aśivāṃ yo 'svatantraḥ prapede |
T09gopjatmu:407: gomāyūnāṃ viṣamavirutair agnimālākarālair āryasyāpi prakṛtimṛdukaṃ tasya cetaś cakampe || kravyāśināṃ paravadhapraṇayapragalbhaiḥ pūgair asau parivṛto vigatāsukalpaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:408: prākhyāpayat sa bhavabhogalavābhilāṣaduḥkhāni tasya ca vaco vigatasravasya
T09gopjatmu:409: tasya tathā kṛcchragatasya puradvāri parivartamānasya gavāṃ nirgacchantīnāṃ puraḥsaro vṛṣabhas tam āyuṣmantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidhiyogasāmarthyāt pitevopagu tāvad avatasthe yāvad atikrāntaḥ sarvo gaugaṇaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:410: so 'titīvravedanāturatanur alpasthāmatayā kaṇṭhagataprāṇaḥ punar api mayā vyasanam evānubhavanīyaṃ maraṇād ūrdhvam ity abhiviṣādo 'pi
T09gopjatmu:412: vanavihagapakṣapātoddhṛtadharaṇitalarajo'vakīrṇadeho nirākrando mandam aparispandakaracaraṇavadanakamala idānīṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti buddham eva
T09gopjatmu:414: tadbhāgyaśeṣopakṛṣṭā iva copāsakā buddhadharmasaṃghānuvādāśrayāḥ saṃkathāḥ kathayantas taṃ pradeśam upajagmuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:415: sa tān avalokya pratyujjīvita iva mṛdusphuṭakalena vacasā kamalapalāśakomalaṃ pāṇim abhiprasāryābravīt
T09gopjatmu:416: bho bhoḥ satpuruṣā muhūrtakaṃ tāvad asmadanukampayāvatiṣṭhadhvam iti |
T09gopjatmu:417: atha te sahasā tacchabdaśravaṇasaṃbhrāntāḥ kim idaṃ kathaṃ cety utpannavimarśāḥ sthitā vayaṃ bhadramukhete taṃ mahāsattvam āśvāsayāṃ babhūvuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:419: avasthāṃś ca vayaś cedaṃ vāksauṣṭhavam idaṃ ca te |
T09gopjatmu:420: matvā calati no buddhiḥ kautūhalasamākulā || GoBhl_89 ||
T09gopjatmu:421: tat saumya vada ko nāma tvaṃ devo 'py atha dānavaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:422: kathaṃ cemāṃ daśāṃ prāptaḥ sajjanāyāsakāriṇīm || GoBhl_90 ||
T09gopjatmu:424: mānuṣo 'smi mahāsattvā nāhaṃ devo na dānavaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:425: bhavasaṃbhogatarṣeṇa prāptas tv aham imāṃ daśām || GoBhl_91 ||
T09gopjatmu:429: vistaraṃ śrotum icchāmaḥ sa cet khedaṃ na manyase || GoBhl_93 ||
T09gopjatmu:430: sa tān ity avadad yūyaṃ dharmabhrātara eva me |
T09gopjatmu:431: duḥkhāni tāvad vāryantāṃ paścād vakṣyāmi vistaram || GoBhl_94 ||
T09gopjatmu:432: tatheti ca pratiśrutya gṛhītvā pāṇibhiḥ śanaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:433: pramṛjyāstīrya vastrāṇi svāni teṣu nyaveśayan || GoBhl_95 ||
T09gopjatmu:434: prasvasthakāyaḥ sa samāhitātmā catvāri satyāni yathekṣitāni |
T09gopjatmu:435: parīkṣamāṇo na cireṇa sādhur malān yathāsthūlamayāṃś cakāra || GoBhl_96 ||
T09gopjatmu:436: ⏑ anuśayaviśeṣaṃ bhāvanāmārgaheyaṃ ⏑ ravir iva niśāntadhvāntam ullikhya bhābhiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:438: atha sa mahātmā kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ kṣaṇam apy avasthāṃ tāṃ parityajya sabahumānaḥ kevalaṃ teṣām upāsakānāṃ kṛtajñatām anurakṣan paryaṅkaṃ gaganatale baddhvā taiḥ sabahumānam udīkṣyamāṇo vistareṇa tebhyo yathāvṛttaṃ vyāhṛtya punar api tān ābabhāṣe |
T09gopjatmu:439: abhinandati yo janma sa duḥkham abhinandati |
T09gopjatmu:440: duḥkhābhinandī duḥkhebhyo na jātu parimucyate || GoBhl_98 ||
T09gopjatmu:445: viṣopadigdhā niśitā ivāyasāḥ śikhā ivāgneḥ prabalānilākulāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:446: sabhīmanādā iva cāśmavṛṣṭayaḥ pravṛttayo duṣprasahāḥ śarīriṇām ||
T09gopjatmu:448: paraṃ samutkṣipya nipātayaty adho vipattipātālatale duruttare || GoBhl_102
T09gopjatmu:450: upādadānasya na jātv imāṃ śivaṃ narasya saṃskāravikārasaṃkulām ||
T09gopjatmu:452: janāḥ saroṣā iva nirdahanty amī svam indriyagrāmam anarthapaṇḍitāḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:454: arīn imān ātmasamudbhavān bhavān sukhābhimānāś chalitāḥ śarīriṇaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:455: niśamya ko nāma viḍambanām imāṃ pumān madīyāṃ śravaṇopatāpinīm |
T09gopjatmu:457: ta eva santaḥ sukham adhyupāsate sanātanaṃ śāntam atītamānuṣam |
T09gopjatmu:458: bhavopabhogapraṇayānupātinī matir na yeṣāṃ pariśuddhakarmaṇām || GoBhl_107
T09gopjatmu:459: hatāvalepāḥ pariśuddhavṛttayaḥ sthitās ta evopari sarvasaṃpadām |
T09gopjatmu:460: na bhāvanāṃ ye ślathayanti sādhavaḥ pravṛttyupādānaviṣopaśāntaye ||
T09gopjatmu:462: saṃvejya parṣadam ṛṣiḥ sa upāsakānāṃ sadyo yayau praśamam agnir ivāmbuṣiktaḥ || GoBhl_109
T09gopjatmu:464: Kapīśvarajātakam = GoKī based on the edition by Michael Hahn. "Gopadatta's Kapīśvarajātaka ḥ Re-edited and translated", Bukkyḥ Bunka Kenkyūjo Kiyḥ [= Bulletin of Research Institute for Buddhist Culture, Ryukoku University] 46 (2007),
T09gopjatmu:466: 4. Kapīśvarajātakam = GoKī abhyasyanti tathā tathāgatasutās tyāgaṃ yathā svān api prāṇān prāṇikṛte tyajanti kṛpayā rogān ivāyāsinaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:467: kṣudrāḥ pāpavidhau tathā tv abhiratiṃ badhnanti niḥsādhvasā bhūtvā duścaritaikatānamanaso gacchanty adhastād yathā || GoKī_1 ||
T09gopjatmu:468: tadyathānuśrūyate bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasmin vividhavarṇagandharasasaṃpannaphalabhārāvanatadrumopagūḍhe vikacasurabhikusumavallīvirājitaparyante marakatamaṇiprabhāharitaśādvalakuthāstīrṇaviṣamabhūmibhāge kamalakuvalayākaronmīlitavimalajalāśayaparigrahe mahaty araṇye vānarādhipatir babhūva ||
T09gopjatmu:470: gatiṃ tiraścām adhamāṃ prapede sādhuḥ sa kenāpi tu kāraṇena || GoKī_2 ||
T09gopjatmu:471: śubhāśubhaiḥ karmabhir āryakarmā krīḍann ivāsau bhavaraṅgamadhye |
T09gopjatmu:472: nidarśayām āsa vicitrarūpām upāyapūrvām upapattimāyām || GoKī_3 ||
T09gopjatmu:476: babhūva tasya tv anavadyabuddheḥ śubhāśubhe karmaṇi kāmakāraḥ || GoKī_5 ||
T09gopjatmu:480: āryām udbhāvayām āsa paddhatiṃ sa śivodayām || GoKī_7 ||
T09gopjatmu:485: sa tatra mātaram andhāṃ vṛddhāṃ ca paricaran vivekakāmatayā ca svayūtham apahāya teṣu teṣu puṣpaphalasamṛddheṣu vanāntareṣv anutkaṇṭhitamanā vijahāra |
T09gopjatmu:486: aṃsena tāṃ pariharan viṣameṣu deśeṣv amlāyinīṃ srajam ivādhipatiḥ kapīnām
T09gopjatmu:487: ānṛṇyam apratisamaṃ sa jagāma mātur garbhādidhāraṇapariśramakheditāyāḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:488: pākopapāditarasaiḥ sa phalaprakārair niṣprāṇakaiś ca madhubhiḥ kusumādhivāsaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:489: toyaiś ca phullakamalotpalinīmanojñais tāṃ mātaraṃ paricacāra viśuddhasattvaḥ || GoKī_11 ||
T09gopjatmu:491: vijahāra vivikteṣu parvateṣu vaneṣu ca || GoKī_12 ||
T09gopjatmu:492: atha kadā cid anyatamo vyādho dhanvī pṛṣṭhāvāpī pragāḍhāvabaddhaparikaro mālutāvatānasaṃyatākulakeśabhārabhāsuraḥ śvāpadān abhidravaṃs taṃ deśam abhijagāma |
T09gopjatmu:494: dṛṣṭvā mṛtyum ivāpatantam atha taṃ tadgocarāḥ prāṇino yātāḥ kvāpi vilaṅghya kaṇṭakalatānaddhān prapātān api || GoKī_13 ||
T09gopjatmu:495: atha sa durātmā viphalaprayāsatayā sutarāṃ krodhāgninā pradīptamānasaḥ saśiraḥprakampaṃ niśvasya ca palāśikayāvagṛhya lalāṭapuṭaprasvedasalilaṃ tam evānukampamānaṃ taṃ vānarādhipatiṃ dadarśa pādapaikadeśāvasthitam |
T09gopjatmu:499: atha sa durātmā dhanuṣi niśitaṃ sāyakaṃ saṃdhāya vegena bodhisattvam abhidudrāva |
T09gopjatmu:500: sa ca mahātmā lobhanīyataraṃ vapur avetya mayi ca nāsyāyaṃ nirbandha iti |
T09gopjatmu:503: muṣṭiprahāreṇa sa śailaśṛṅgaṃ śakto 'pi saṃcūrṇayituṃ mahātmā |
T09gopjatmu:504: jālmaṃ tam eva tv anukampamānas tadbāṇasaṃpātapathād vyatītaḥ || GoKī_15
T09gopjatmu:505: sa ca puruṣādhamas tīvratarasaṃrambhamanyuvegākulīkṛtāśayas tāṃ bodhisattvajananīṃ pratyākṛṣṭatīkṣṇabāṇāśanir abhisasāda |
T09gopjatmu:507: pāpakriyāyām avicārya kāryaṃ caranti lokasya niraṅkuśāni || GoKī_16 ||
T09gopjatmu:508: atha bodhisattvaḥ purāyaṃ me mātaraṃ vyāpādayatīty avigaṇitasvaprāṇātyayaḥ sasaṃbhramadrutataragatir abhigamya taṃ vyādhaṃ sānunayapraśamamadhuram ity abravīt |
T09gopjatmu:509: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mahāsattva mā vadhīr jananīṃ mama |
T09gopjatmu:510: kas tavemāṃ guṇo hatvā vṛddhāṃ proṣitalocanām || GoKī_17 ||
T09gopjatmu:512: ātmasnehānumānena mā vyātsīr mama mātaram || GoKī_18 ||
T09gopjatmu:514: vyāpādayitum ambāṃ me sādhos tava na yujyate || GoKī_19 ||
T09gopjatmu:517: purātanair eva hatāṃ karmabhiḥ paruṣair imām |
T09gopjatmu:518: ghnato niraparādhāṃ te kathaṃ notpadyate dayā || GoKī_21 ||
T09gopjatmu:520: na lajjase kathaṃ nāma muñcañ chākhāmṛgītanau || GoKī_22 ||
T09gopjatmu:522: niyujyamānau kṛpaṇāśrayeṣu daurbhāgyam udbhāvayataḥ sphuṭaṃ te || GoKī_23
T09gopjatmu:523: amuktapūrvo hariṇāṅganāsv apy akṣūṇalakṣas tava kaṅkapattraḥ |
T09gopjatmu:527: tasmād udvīkṣasva paraṃ ca lokam imāṃ ca vṛddhām aparāyaṇāṃ tvam |
T09gopjatmu:528: mā gā vaśaṃ roṣaniśācarasya lokadvayānarthaśatāvahasya || GoKī_26 ||
T09gopjatmu:529: evam apy asāv ucyamānaḥ krauryābhyāsakaṭhorahṛdayapāṣāṇas tad bodhisattvavacanam ākarṇyaivāvadhīrayām āsa |
T09gopjatmu:532: atha vānareśvaras tam anāryakarmāṇam anunayavidhuram avagamya cintām āpede |
T09gopjatmu:533: mātary ayaṃ yadi mama praharaty anāryaḥ saṃpaśyato mama vadhaḥ sakalaḥ sa eva |
T09gopjatmu:534: tyaktvā svajīvitam ataḥ paripālayāmi vṛddhām imāṃ kumudinīdhavalāṃ ca kīrtim || GoKī_28 ||
T09gopjatmu:535: kāmaṃ mṛte mayi mariṣyati viklaveyaṃ hā putraketi kṛpaṇā karuṇaṃ rudantī |
T09gopjatmu:536: yuktas tathāpi mama pūrvataraṃ vināśo draṣṭuṃ guruvyasanam asti na me prabhutvam || GoKī_29
T09gopjatmu:537: jātaś ca nāma na vinakṣyati vety ayuktam utpāda eva niyamena nipātahetuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:538: tulye ca nāma maraṇavyasanopatāpe mṛtyur varaṃ parahitāvahitāśayasya ||
T09gopjatmu:541: duḥkhaṃ tu nirgārayatīva ceto mamaikam evāvinivāryavīryam |
T09gopjatmu:542: ambā mṛtaṃ māṃ yad iyaṃ viditvā duḥkhena saṃtyakṣyati jīvalokam || GoKī_32
T09gopjatmu:543: arthāya netravyasanaṃ tu jātam asyā na māṃ drakṣyati māryamāṇam |
T09gopjatmu:544: yad asya tīkṣṇena durādhareṇa vyādhaprayuktena śilīmukhena || GoKī_33 ||
T09gopjatmu:545: kṛtvā ca yat pāpam ayaṃ tapasvī duḥkhāni saṃprāpsyati dāruṇāni |
T09gopjatmu:546: etan mano nirdahatīva mahyaṃ prāṇoparodhaṃ svam acintayitvā || GoKī_34 ||
T09gopjatmu:547: dhig astu saṃkleśapiśācavaiśasaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ dhig anarthapaṇḍitam |
T09gopjatmu:548: vipattipātālatale duruttare vṛthaiva yal lokam imaṃ vimuñcati || GoKī_35
T09gopjatmu:551: amogho yad ayaṃ bāṇas tvayā tāta samudyataḥ |
T09gopjatmu:552: mayi prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ mā kārṣīr mṛtamārikām || GoKī_36 ||
T09gopjatmu:553: atha sā vṛddhā vānarī taṃ bodhisattvasyātiduṣkaraṃ hṛdayasaṃtāpakaraṃ vyavasāyam avetya pāṇibhyāṃ hṛdayam abhighnantī sāśrukaṇṭhā gadgadāyamānavacanā bodhisattvam āha |
T09gopjatmu:554: putra mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīr mayy eva praharatv ayam |
T09gopjatmu:555: mṛtayāpi mayā kiṃ syāj jarayāpītasārayā || GoKī_37 ||
T09gopjatmu:556: yad ahaṃ tāta jīvāmi durmanā duḥkhabhāginī |
T09gopjatmu:557: tvatsaṅgamasukhābhyāsaṃ rasāgraṃ na varaṃ hi tat || GoKī_38 ||
T09gopjatmu:559: nimīlite tvayi vyaktaṃ diśaḥ sarvā nimīlitāḥ || GoKī_39 ||
T09gopjatmu:563: tvayi jīvati jīvantīṃ mām avehi mṛtām api || GoKī_41 ||
T09gopjatmu:566: atha bodhisattvo 'bhipraṇamyānuneṣyann anukampāśītalair api nirdahann iva vacobhir jananīṃ praty āha |
T09gopjatmu:567: kṣudrajantor api kṛte jahyāṃ dehaśatāny api |
T09gopjatmu:568: mātur arthe tyajed deham itaro 'pi gatavyathaḥ || GoKī_43 ||
T09gopjatmu:570: tavaiva paricaryāyai mātaḥ pariharāmy aham || GoKī_44 ||
T09gopjatmu:571: na ca me kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathā janayati vyathām |
T09gopjatmu:572: mānasenaiva duḥkhena yathā pīḍye vidāhinā || GoKī_45 ||
T09gopjatmu:574: duḥkhaṃ manomayaṃ soḍhuṃ kathaṃ śakṣyāmi duḥsaham || GoKī_46 ||
T09gopjatmu:576: ucchrāyā vinipātinaḥ priyajanaśleṣā visaṃyoginaḥ sarve saṃnicayāḥ kṣayāntavirasā dīpāḥ prabhāteṣv iva |
T09gopjatmu:577: mṛtyor aprativāryavīryamahataḥ krīḍāmṛgāḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃsārādhvani dehināṃ vicaratāṃ dharmānukṛtyaṃ param || GoKī_47 ||
T09gopjatmu:578: atha sā bodhisattvajananī śītair ananyasattvasadṛśaiḥ karuṇāniṣyandabhūtaiḥ snehātiśayodgāribhiḥ svajīvitanirapekṣair aparimlāyamānagauravaprasādapeśalais tadvacobhiḥ sutarām ākleditahṛdayā vyāpinā svareṇa tad vanam āpūrayantī sakaruṇaṃ virurāva |
T09gopjatmu:579: amūni tava vākyāni śītāny api dahanti mām |
T09gopjatmu:581: hā mātṛvatsala ripuṣv api maitracitta kṣudreṣv api prakṛtibhadra mṛdusvabhāva |
T09gopjatmu:582: putrāpahāya kṛpaṇāṃ kva nu yāsyasi tvaṃ mām adya duḥkhaśatabāṇaśaravyabhūtām || GoKī_49 ||
T09gopjatmu:583: hā hā hatāsmi kṛpaṇā cyutabhāgadheyā daivena sādhujananirdayapauruṣeṇa |
T09gopjatmu:584: saṃrakṣa māṃ suciram ekapade jahāsi kiṃ putrakādya nanu saiva tavāsmi mātā || GoKī_50 ||
T09gopjatmu:585: yātāḥ kva te 'dya munayo jvalitaprabhāvāḥ sakhyaḥ kva tāḥ pratigatā vanadevatās te |
T09gopjatmu:586: dharmāya rakṣati jagat kila dharmajīvī kasmāj jagan mama nimīlati putraśūnyam || GoKī_51 ||
T09gopjatmu:587: śailā nirjhariṇaḥ kadambakakubhaśreṇīniruddhātapā nadyaś ca sphuṭapadmareṇuharitakṣāmormimālādharāḥ
T09gopjatmu:588: saṃśāntā vanarājayaś ca śikhinā sudyotitāś candrakair bhānor aṃśukarālitāś ca divasā rakṣantu me putrakam || GoKī_52 ||
T09gopjatmu:589: acetanānām api pādapānāṃ babhūva kampo ruditena tena |
T09gopjatmu:590: mṛdūkṛtaṃ tasya na nāma ceto manāg api krūramanorathasya || GoKī_53 ||
T09gopjatmu:591: atha sa durātmā tadvākyaśravaṇajvalitakopānalādīptahṛdayaḥ kathāparyavasānam avigaṇayyaiva bodhisattvaṃ tīkṣṇena bāṇena marmadeśe
T09gopjatmu:593: śivāvirutajarjarā iva diśo 'bhavaṃs tatkṣaṇaṃ tatāna bahalaṃ tamo dviradayūthanīlaṃ jagat
T09gopjatmu:594: bhayād iva cakampire vilulitopalāḥ parvatāḥ papāta śalabhāvalīvalayapiṅgalaṃ khād rajaḥ || viśuṣkajalabhairavāḥ pradaragahvarāḥ sindhavo dvitīya iva bhāskare samudite 'bhavaṃs tatkṣaṇam
T09gopjatmu:595: papāta rudhiraṃ divo ghaṭamukhair ivāvarjitaṃ hate kapigaṇādhipe sucaritaikaratnākare || GoKī_55
T09gopjatmu:596: atha sa dasyus tad atidāruṇaṃ karma kṛtvā sadyas tadvipākacihnākulīkṛtahṛdayaḥ svam āvāsam abhipratasthe |
T09gopjatmu:597: tatra ca tatkarmāparādhena bhairavo niṣpratīkārarabhasajvālāmālākulo mahadagniḥ prajajvāla
T09gopjatmu:598: dūrād eva tam āpatantam anilapreṅkholanācañcalaiḥ sadyo 'gniḥ pariṣaṣvaje priyam iva jvālābhujair āyataiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:599: karma kṣetraviśeṣabṛṃhitaphalaṃ karmāntarāvyāhataṃ nikṣepaṃ vapuṣo vipākacapalaṃ nodīkṣate prāṇinām || GoKī_56 ||
T09gopjatmu:601: āliṅgito 'sau kaṭhināntarātmā mumoha hā heti ca saṃrurāva || GoKī_57 ||
T09gopjatmu:603: nipapāta samutpapāta cāsāv asakṛn mīna ivāturas tapasvī || GoKī_58 ||
T09gopjatmu:604: tasyāsthiśeṣam api kāpuruṣasya dagdhvā vahniḥ saroṣa iva naiva śaśāma śīghram |
T09gopjatmu:605: taddūṣitāṃ vasumatīm api dagdhukāmo jajvāla dhūmakapiśārcir ⏑ – ⏑ antaḥ || GoKī_59 ||
T09gopjatmu:607: rejus te pralayavilīyamānasānor niryāsāḥ kanakagirer iva sravantaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:608: dagdho duścaritāgnibhiḥ sa paruṣair dagdhaḥ punaḥ pāvakaiḥ pāpātmā sakalatraputravibhavaḥ śuṣko yathā pādapaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:609: taṃ bhūyo 'pi dadāha dāruṇataraḥ karmendhano nārako vahnir dhūmakalākalaṅkitamukhajvālākalāpaś ciram || GoKī_61 ||
T09gopjatmu:610: avetya pāpakarmaṇām idaṃ vipākavaiśasaṃ vivarjayed asatkriyāṃ bhujaṅgamāṅganām iva |
T09gopjatmu:611: prasādayec ca mānasaṃ prasādanīyakarmasu jinauraseṣv akāraṇaprajāhitābhiyogiṣu || GoKī_62
T09gopjatmu:613: Maitrakanyaka = GoMk based on the edition by Konrad Klaus. Das Maitrakanyakāvadāna (Divyāvadāna
T09gopjatmu:615: 5. Maitrakanyaka mātary apakāriṇaḥ prāṇina ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānamānasaiḥ satpuruṣair mātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:616: tadyathānuśrūyate vikasitasitakumudendukundakusumāvalīguṇagaṇavibhūṣitaḥ pūrvajanmāntaropāttāprameyānavadyavipulasakalasaṃbhāro dhanadasamānaratnāśrayaḥ svajanakṛpaṇavanīpakabhujyamānodāravibhavasāranicayo mitro nāma sārthavāho babhūva |
T09gopjatmu:618: tasyāryasattvasya nabhasy anabhre karā ivendoḥ kumudāvadātāḥ || GoMk_1 ||
T09gopjatmu:620: āśāvatāṃ sapraṇayābhirāmair dānāmbusekaiḥ śamayāṃ babhūva || GoMk_2 ||
T09gopjatmu:621: dṛṣṭvā lokam imaṃ dhanakṣayabhayāt saṃtyaktadānotsavaṃ lobhakleśapiśācikāvaśatayā saṃdūṣitādhyāśayam
T09gopjatmu:622: kāruṇyāt sa dadāv anāthakṛpaṇaklībāturebhyo dhanaṃ matvā vāyuhatārṇavormicapalaṃ svaṃ jīvitaṃ bhūyasā || GoMk_3 ||
T09gopjatmu:623: yeṣu vyāsajya ceto bhujagavaravadhūbhogabhīmeṣu lubdhā gāhante pāpagartaṃ sphuṭadahanaśikhābhīmaparyantarandhram
T09gopjatmu:624: vātāghātapranṛttapravaranaravadhūnetrapakṣmāgralolāṃs tān arthān arthiduḥkhavyupaśamapaṭubhiḥ protsasarja pradānaiḥ || GoMk_4 ||
T09gopjatmu:625: tasyāputradhanatvāt putrābhilāṣiṇo yadā manorathaśatair asakṛd unmiṣitonmiṣitāḥ putraśriyaḥ prasahya sphītataravairabhārendhanavahnineva vigatanikhilapratīkāradāruṇaprabhāvamahatāśu kṛtāntālayaikaparāyaṇāḥ kriyante sma tadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṃ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṃkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārthaṃ yācitum ārebhe |
T09gopjatmu:626: yasmin yasmiṃs tanayasarasi svacchapuṇyāmbupūrṇe vavre vṛddhiṃ samuditamahāvaṃśalakṣmyambujanma
T09gopjatmu:627: tat tat tasya prabālavirasāṃ yāti tīkṣṇāṃśumālaiḥ śoṣaṃ ninye ravir iva jalaṃ bhāgadheyārkabimbam rudraṃ naikakapālaśekharadharaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ vajriṇaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ makaradhvajaṃ girisutāputraṃ mayūrāsanam |
T09gopjatmu:628: gaṅgāṃ śaṅkhadalāvadātasalilāṃ tāṃ tāṃś ca devān asau putrārthī śaraṇaṃ yayau bahu punar dānaṃ dvijebhyo dadau || GoMk_6 ||
T09gopjatmu:629: yad yaj jano maṅgaladeśanābhir vratopavāsādhigataiś ca duḥkhaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:630: putrārthasaṃsiddhinimagnabuddhir vikṣipya khedaṃ sa cakāra tāṃs tān ||
T09gopjatmu:632: evam anekaprakāraṃ kāyacetassor āyāsakāribhir api vratopavāsamaṅgalair yadā naiva kadā cit kāle 'sya putrā jīvino babhūvus tadaivam ativipule pragāḍhaśokāpagāmbhasi nimajjantaṃ kaś cit sādhupuruṣo 'bravīt |
T09gopjatmu:634: bhūtānāṃ tuṅgaśṛṅgāc ca vinipāto na bhūtaye || GoMk_9 ||
T09gopjatmu:636: na ca te 'dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṃ parikhidyase || GoMk_10 ||
T09gopjatmu:637: karmāṇi nirmucya kathaṃ bhavebhyaḥ svargaukasas tuṣṭivaśād iheyuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:638: ye yair vinā nātmabhavaṃ labhante te tair vinā janma kathaṃ bhajeran ||
T09gopjatmu:639: ye sāṃsārikanaikaduḥkhadahanajvālālatāliṅgitās te vāñchanti narāmaroragasukhaṃ prāyeṇa dānādibhiḥ
T09gopjatmu:640: tvaṃ kenāpi viḍambyase jaḍamatiḥ putrāśayonmattako yas tvaṃ dyām adhigantum icchasi bṛhatsopānamālāśrayāt vidhim aparam ahaṃ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai tvam api ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai kadā cit
T09gopjatmu:641: yadi bhavati sutas te kanyakānāma tasya sakalajanapade 'smin khyāpayasva prasiddhyai || GoMk_13
T09gopjatmu:642: atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalam aṃśumālīva svakiraṇanikarair virājamānaṃ svavaṃśalakṣmīḥ putraṃ janayāṃ babhūva |
T09gopjatmu:645: mūrtis tasya rarāja meruśikharād dhemaṃ yathā bhūcyutaṃ prodgīrṇasvamayūkhajālajaṭilai ratnāṅkurair veṣṭitam || GoMk_15 ||
T09gopjatmu:647: tanayam uditacetā maitrakanyābhidhānaṃ daśadivasapareṇa khyāpayām āsa loke || GoMk_16 ||
T09gopjatmu:649: sudhāvadātaiḥ sphuṭacandrapādaiḥ payodhiveleva yayau samṛddhim || GoMk_17
T09gopjatmu:650: dhātrībhiḥ sa samunnītaḥ kṣīraiś ca sarpimaṇḍakaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:651: pupoṣa sundaraṃ dehaṃ hradastham iva paṅkajam || GoMk_18 ||
T09gopjatmu:652: atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:653: dravyair vahanam āropya jagāhe toyadhiṃ mudā || GoMk_19 ||
T09gopjatmu:655: pitur vyatīte jananīṃ jagāda cakāra kiṃ karma pitā mameti || GoMk_20 ||
T09gopjatmu:660: eṣo 'pi mama mandāyā nāśam eṣyati toyadhau || GoMk_22 ||
T09gopjatmu:661: yāvac cāyaṃ janapadam imaṃ tasya vṛttiṃ na bhūtāṃ pṛcchaty asmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:662: tāvad yuktaṃ mama sutam imaṃ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṃ nānāduḥkhavyasanagahanaṃ vyādhisaktaṃ niṣeddhum paro 'pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṃ vihāya mārgaṃ śrayate vimārgam |
T09gopjatmu:663: nivāraṇīyaḥ sa matāj janena prayatnataḥ kiṃ punar eva putraḥ || GoMk_24 ||
T09gopjatmu:666: yady ahaṃ sukhitā kāryā kārayaukarikāpaṇam || GoMk_25 ||
T09gopjatmu:667: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātur vacanaṃ kusumamālām iva śirasā samabhivadyānyasminn ahani [!] aukarikāpaṇaṃ prasasāra |
T09gopjatmu:670: svagarbhasaṃdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai |
T09gopjatmu:672: atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṃtanā aukarikās te tasya tam abhivardhamānaṃ krayavikrayalokam aviṣamavyavahāranītyā prakṛtipremapeśalatayā cāvarjitamanasaṃ tasmin mahāsattve vyavahārārtham āpatantam avalokya taṃ tasmāt karmaṇo vinivartanārtham āhuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:673: gāndhikāpaṇikaḥ śreṣṭhī pitā te 'smin pure purā |
T09gopjatmu:674: sa tvaṃ tāṃ vṛttim ujjhitvā śrayase 'nyāṃ kayā dhiyā || GoMk_28 ||
T09gopjatmu:675: atha bodhisattvas tām api jīvikām apahāya gāndhikāpaṇaṃ cakāra |
T09gopjatmu:676: yasminn eva dine cakre sa sādhur gāndhikāpaṇam |
T09gopjatmu:679: atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ vicchandayām āsuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:680: gāndhāpaṇaṃ klībajanābhipannaṃ pitā na vaimadyapure cakāra |
T09gopjatmu:681: tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṃ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṃsi samāpa sādho || GoMk_30
T09gopjatmu:682: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tām api jīvikām apahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ cakāra |
T09gopjatmu:683: tayāpi tasmin vyavahāranītyā hairaṇyikāṃs tān abhibhūya sarvān |
T09gopjatmu:684: lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca || GoMk_31
T09gopjatmu:686: dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣāya [!] mātre tān api dattavān || GoMk_32 ||
T09gopjatmu:687: atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ tasmāt karmaṇo vinivartanārtham āhuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:689: kṛpaṇāṃ jīvikāhetor vṛttim āśrayate bhavān || GoMk_33 ||
T09gopjatmu:691: vivartitaṃ ślāghyam ativa puṃsāṃ na tu svavṛtteś cyavanaṃ pravṛttam ||
T09gopjatmu:693: agādhapātālavilagnamūlān pitā vigāhyārjitavān dhanaṃ te || GoMk_35 ||
T09gopjatmu:694: yad āśritaṃ karma janānuvartinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā |
T09gopjatmu:695: kathaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi bhāgyasaṃpadaṃ pitur vyatīte 'pi viśālinīṃ śriyam || GoMk_36 ||
T09gopjatmu:697: tasyā [!] mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ na bibharṣi lajjām ||
T09gopjatmu:698: ye mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāmaṃ bhajante na ye gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ
T09gopjatmu:699: te tīrtvā jaladhīn agādhasalilān āvartabhīmān budhāḥ prāpyārthān gajadantabhaṅgasitayā cinvanti kīrtyā jagat || GoMk_38 ||
T09gopjatmu:700: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tebhyo 'py tathānuguṇinīṃ kathām avadhārya
T09gopjatmu:702: amba sārthavāhaḥ kilāsmākaṃ pitā purā tad anujñāṃ prayaccha yad aham api mahāsamudram avatariṣyāmīti
T09gopjatmu:703: sā pūrvam eva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya tenāsaṃlakṣitadāruṇena viyogaśokaśastreṇa bhṛśataraṃ pravidāryamāṇahṛdayā svatanayam āha |
T09gopjatmu:705: jīvitaṃ kasya te 'niṣṭaṃ tvayā krīḍāṃ karoti kaḥ || GoMk_39 ||
T09gopjatmu:706: daivāt kathaṃ cit saṃprāptaṃ cakṣur ekaṃ tvam adya me |
T09gopjatmu:708: na yāvad ekaṃ mama duḥkhaśalyaṃ prayāti nāśaṃ pravidārya śokam |
T09gopjatmu:709: kathaṃ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṃ nipātyate pāpamayair amitraiḥ || GoMk_41
T09gopjatmu:710: yeṣāṃ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyaṃ yaiḥ saṃtyaktaṃ kṛpaṇahṛdayair jīvitaṃ bhogalubdhaiḥ
T09gopjatmu:711: te saṃtyaktvā [!] nayanagalitāśrupravāhārdravaktrān bandhūn ajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam || GoMk_42 ||
T09gopjatmu:713: saṃtyajya yātuṃ katham udyamas te mā sā kathā mānavaro madīyam || GoMk_43
T09gopjatmu:715: saṃpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato 'ham evaṃ suta vārayāmi || GoMk_44 ||
T09gopjatmu:716: sa tasyā hitārthaṃ madhurāṇy api vacanakusumāni tṛṇam ivāvadhūya sapragalbhatayā samavalambitavikatthāśobhaṃ kiṃ cid īdṛśaṃ pratyāha |
T09gopjatmu:717: varaṃ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:718: jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṃ mṛtyur na jīvitam || GoMk_45 ||
T09gopjatmu:720: arthino mama pāpasya yānti niśvasya durmanāḥ [!] || GoMk_46 ||
T09gopjatmu:721: ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṃ sahante |
T09gopjatmu:722: lokaṃ punar duḥkhaśatopataptaṃ draṣṭuṃ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ || GoMk_47
T09gopjatmu:723: tasmād vilaṅghāmi vacas tavedaṃ yāsyāmi taṃ tvaṃ prajahīhi śokam |
T09gopjatmu:724: tatraiva yāyāṃ nidhanaṃ samudre chinnaṃ mayā vā vyasanaṃ janasya ||
T09gopjatmu:725: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaram apramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhād vārāṇasyāṃ puryām ātmānaṃ sārthavāham ity udghoṣayām āsa |
T09gopjatmu:726: asyām eva purā puraṃdarapurīpraspardhipuryāṃ vaṇiṅ mitro nāma babhūva yaḥ suranaraprakhyātakīrtidhvajaḥ
T09gopjatmu:727: putras tasya mahāsamudram acirād yāsyaty amuṣmin dine yātuṃ ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇās te santu sajjā iti || GoMk_49 ||
T09gopjatmu:728: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo vividhopakaraṇasaṃbhārasādhanānāṃ samāgṛhītapuṇyāhaprasthānabhadrāṇām upahṛtamaṅgalavidhānānāṃ vaṇijāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ kṛtaparivāraḥ prasasāra |
T09gopjatmu:733: anilabalākulitagalitasajalajaladapaṭalāvalīmalinakeśapāśā satvaratvaram abhigamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya pādayoḥ pariṣvajyaivam āha |
T09gopjatmu:735: anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṃ hitam |
T09gopjatmu:736: satāṃ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṃ giro 'pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām || GoMk_50
T09gopjatmu:738: dharaṇitalanimagnāṃ mātaraṃ śokavaśyāṃ śirasi kupitacittaḥ pādavajreṇa hatvā |
T09gopjatmu:739: muhur upacitaśokaḥ karmaṇā preryamāṇas tvaritamatir abhūt – saṃprayātuṃ vaṇigbhiḥ || GoMk_51
T09gopjatmu:741: putraka mayi gamananivṛttiṃ kartum abhyudyatāyāṃ yad upacitam apuṇyaṃ macchirastāḍanāt te
T09gopjatmu:742: vyasanaphalam anantaṃ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo 'sya
T09gopjatmu:743: punar api guruvākyaṃ mātigāḥ svapnato 'pi || GoMk_52 ||
T09gopjatmu:744: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo vividhavihārāyatanaparvatopavanagahvarasarittaḍāgārāmaramaṇīyatarān anekanagaranigamakarvaṭagrāmādīn anuvicaran krameṇa samudratīraṃ saṃprāpya sajjīkṛtayānapātro bhujagapativadanavisṛtaśvasanacapalānilabalavilulitavipulavimalasalilam aruṇataruṇakiraṇanikararucirapadmarāgapuñjaprabhārāgarañjitormimālājalam asurasvarasamasurasureśvarakarodarasphuritahutavahaśikhāvalīkarālavajrapatanabhayanilīnadharaṇīdharaśikharaparāhatajaloddhatottuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgaraudraṃ samudram avatatāra |
T09gopjatmu:746: saritsahasrāmburayapravāhair bhujair vilāsair iva gṛhyamāṇam || GoMk_53 ||
T09gopjatmu:757: tad eva sa saṃlakṣya tīraparyantarekhaṃ prakaṭavikaṭāvartagartodarabhramadbhramitajhaṣabhujagakulamaṇḍalaṃ naikavicitrādbhutāścaryam atiśayam ambhasām ālayam atikramatas tasya dharaṇīdharaśikharavipulātmabhāvasya makarakaripater vivartamānasya samutthitair urvīdharākāradāruṇaiḥ pramuktakalakalārāvaraudrair mahadbhiḥ salilanivahair utpīḍyamānaṃ tad yānapātraṃ maraṇabhayaviṣādabhraśyamānagātrair dīnaruditākranditamātraparāyaṇaiḥ
T09gopjatmu:758: saṃyānapātrakaiḥ saha sahasaiva salilanidher adhaḥ praveṣṭum ārabdham |
T09gopjatmu:760: tad yānapātraṃ jaladher jalaughair āsphālyamānaṃ vidadāra madhye ||
T09gopjatmu:761: daṃṣṭrākarāle jhaṣavaktrarandhre kaś cin mamārārtaravas tapasvī |
T09gopjatmu:762: ke cij jalodgāraniruddhakaṇṭhā jagmur nirucchvāsagiro vyasutvam || GoMk_60
T09gopjatmu:763: gatvāpi ke cit phalakair mahadbhir ambhonidhes tīram avekṣamāṇāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:765: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tena mahatā vyasanopanipātenāpy anāpatitabhayaviṣādadainyāyāsamanāḥ samavalambya mahad dhairyaparākramaṃ sasaṃbhramaṃ phalakam ādāya prasasāra |
T09gopjatmu:767: tataḥ samākṣipyamāṇo nirāhāratayā ca parimlāyamānanayanavadanakamalaś cānyair bahubhir ahorātrair yathā kathaṃ cit tasya duravagāhasalilasya mahārṇavasya dakṣiṇaṃ tīradeśam āsasāda |
T09gopjatmu:768: tīrtvā tam ambhonidhim apragādham āsādya tīraṃ phalakaṃ mumoca |
T09gopjatmu:769: saṃsmṛtya mātur vacanaṃ sa pāṇau vyāsajya mūrdhānam idaṃ jagāda || GoMk_62
T09gopjatmu:770: śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṃ gurūṇāṃ vākyaṃ hitārthodayakāryabhadram |
T09gopjatmu:771: teṣām imāni vyasanāni puṃsāṃ māyāvahanti prabhavanti mūrdhni || GoMk_63 ||
T09gopjatmu:773: prāptaṃ phalaṃ janmataroḥ sudhībhir ye mānayantīha giro gurūṇām || GoMk_64
T09gopjatmu:774: mātur hitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṃ mama duṣkṛtasya |
T09gopjatmu:775: puṣpaṃ yad īdṛg bharapāpadāruṇaṃ prāntaṃ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya ||
T09gopjatmu:779: ye santo hitavādināṃ sphuṭadhiyāṃ saṃpādayante giraḥ śreyas te samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryāṃ yathā |
T09gopjatmu:781: dustare vyasanodadhau nipatitāḥ śocanti te 'haṃ yathā || GoMk_67 ||
T09gopjatmu:782: tato 'sau krameṇa khadiravaṭasaralaniculabakulatamālatālanālikeśaradrumavanagahanaṃ pravaravāraṇavarāhacamaraśarabhaśambaramahiṣaviṣāṇakarṣaṇapatitamathitavividhamālutālatājāladuḥsaṃcaraṃ kva cit kṣubhitakesarininādabhayacakitavanacarakulākīrṇacaraṇaṃ kathaṃ cid
T09gopjatmu:783: api śabaramanujajanacaraṇākṣuṇṇaparyantam anucaran kva cit sthitvaivam āha
T09gopjatmu:784: ete dāḍimapuṣpalohitamukhāḥ pronmuktakolāhalā hāsādarśitadantapaṅktivirasāḥ śākhāmṛgā nirbhayāḥ
T09gopjatmu:785: sarpān bhīmaviṣānalasphuradurujvālākarālasphuṭān hatvā pāṇitālaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phutkārabhītāḥ punaḥ || GoMk_68 ||
T09gopjatmu:786: ramye kuṅkumaśākhinām aviralacchāyākuthāśītale mūle komalanīlaśādvalavati pravyaktapuṣpotkare
T09gopjatmu:787: vaṃśais tālaravaiḥ sagītamadhuraiḥ pracchedasaṃpādibhiḥ saṃgītāhitacetasaḥ pramuditā gāyanty amī kinnarāḥ || GoMk_69 ||
T09gopjatmu:788: tato nātidūram atisṛtya mahīdharavarākāraṃ parvataṃ dadarśa |
T09gopjatmu:799: kva cid anilavikampitapuṣpataruṃ skhalitojjvalasurabhijalaṃ kusumaprabalaprativāsitasānuśikhaṃ tathāparaṃ dadarśa |
T09gopjatmu:800: likhantaṃ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṃ mayūkhais tamaḥ sāgarāṇām |
T09gopjatmu:801: vahantaṃ samudrāmbarām adrigurvīṃ kṣarantaṃ kva cit kāñcanāmbhaḥpravāham
T09gopjatmu:806: kva cid aṇḍajarājavilāsasamucchritapakṣamahābhujavajravipāṭitasāgaravāritaloddhṛtapannagabhogadharaṃ kva cid eva surāsurasaṃyugaśastravipannamahāsura-
T09gopjatmu:810: prekṣante madavārilolamadhuliṭprollīḍhagaṇḍasthalaṃ darpāt kesariṇo balena mahatā pronmathyamānā gajam || GoMk_78 ||
T09gopjatmu:811: ity evam asāv atikāntāradurgaṃ salilaphalāhāramātraparāyaṇaḥ paribhramann ajñānatamaḥpaṭalāvaguṇṭhitam iva jagat saṃsārapaṅke tribhuvanasvāmīvodayad ramaṇakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa |
T09gopjatmu:817: maṇikanakalatābaddhaśākhaiḥ kva cid urubhis tarubhiḥ prakāmahāri ||
T09gopjatmu:822: tatas taddarśanāt samutpannajīvitāśo 'sau ramaṇaṃ nagaram upasasarpa |
T09gopjatmu:824: dravitanavakanakarasarāgāvadātamūrtayaḥ pravikasitāmbujakusumarucakarucinayanayugalotpalavilāsāḥ kvaṇadruciravividhamaṇimekhalāpabhāramandavilāsagatayaḥ kanakakalaśākārapṛthutarapayodharabharāvanamitatanumadhyā divasakarakarasparśavibodhitāmlānakamalapalāśabhāsurādharakisalayā vividhavibhūṣaṇaśatā nirāmayadarśanāḥ śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayo maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya pādayor vinyāsitaśirasaḥ prāhuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:827: adyaiva duhkhāni śamaṃ gatāni [!] adyaiva no jīvitagātrasāram |
T09gopjatmu:830: bhavantam āsādya vasantakāle vanāntarāṇīva vijṛmbhitāni || GoMk_86 ||
T09gopjatmu:831: yāny arjitāny anyabhavāntareṣu karmāṇi śuklāni śubhodayāni |
T09gopjatmu:832: teṣāṃ phalaṃ vīkṣaṇam eva te 'laṃ saṅgas tvayā kiṃ punar eva dīrgham ||
T09gopjatmu:833: adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṃ kṛthāḥ kasya na santy apāyāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:834: dāsyo vayaṃ te 'psaraś catasraś chāyā na te laṅghayituṃ samarthāḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:835: ratnāni vāsāṃsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāś cārutarā vayaṃ ca |
T09gopjatmu:836: saṃtyaktabhartā surarājayogyā śaktir vidheneha sukhaṃ bhajasva || GoMk_89
T09gopjatmu:837: api ca duḥkhe mahaty apratikāraghore ye vartamānāś ciram udvahanti |
T09gopjatmu:838: te duḥkhabhāropanipātamūḍhās tatraiva śīghraṃ nidhanaṃ prayānti || GoMk_90
T09gopjatmu:839: nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te daivakṛte viyoge |
T09gopjatmu:840: saṃsmṛtya rāgopanipātamūḍhāḥ kāmaprahāraṃ viṣamaṃ prapannāḥ || GoMk_91 ||
T09gopjatmu:842: haimādriśṛṅgam iva tat puram āviśantaṃ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo 'pi
T09gopjatmu:845: kiṃ dīptaraśmir vinigūḍharaśmiḥ kiṃ puṣpaketuḥ sahasāvatīrṇaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:846: hā kiṃ vinikṣiptaharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇām iti tarkito 'bhūt || GoMk_93
T09gopjatmu:850: calatpatākāgravibhinnameghaṃ gehaṃ viveśāpsarasāṃ hi tāsām || GoMk_95 ||
T09gopjatmu:851: tāsāṃ vilāsair gamanaiḥ salīlair hāsaiḥ kaṭākṣair madhuraiḥ pralāpaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:852: krīḍan sa kālaṃ na viveda yātaṃ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ || GoMk_96 ||
T09gopjatmu:853: pratyahaṃ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṃ vārayanti sma |
T09gopjatmu:854: so 'pi yathā yathā nivāryate tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyotsukamanā babhūva |
T09gopjatmu:856: viparyastamatis tatra janaḥ sa paridhāvati || GoMk_97 ||
T09gopjatmu:857: yadi kuryād ayaṃ loke suhṛdāṃ vacanaṃ hitam |
T09gopjatmu:858: paraiti svargaṃ pātālaśvabhre [!] ā svapnato 'pi na || GoMk_98 ||
T09gopjatmu:859: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvas tāsām apsarasām parijñātagamanaprayojano dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi padavīm āruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa |
T09gopjatmu:860: tasmād api nagarād aṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasaṃbhramaṃ niḥsṛtya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ praveśayām āsuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:861: tatrāpy aciraṃ ratim anubhūya pratiṣidhyamānagamanakriyas tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan nandanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa |
T09gopjatmu:862: tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsarobhir abhigamya satkṛtya praveśayām āse |
T09gopjatmu:863: tatrāpi ciraṃ krīḍāṃ sevitvā tasmād api brahmottaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prayayau |
T09gopjatmu:864: tatrāpi dvātriṃśatāpsarobhir bhūyaḥ satkāraṃ viṣayasukham bhuktvā tāḥ prāha |
T09gopjatmu:865: icchāmi gantum tad ahaṃ bhavantyo [!] mā matkṛte śokahrade śayidhvam |
T09gopjatmu:866: saṃpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke || GoMk_99 ||
T09gopjatmu:867: sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṃ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntād bhavitāntakāle |
T09gopjatmu:868: tenaiva netrāśrujalārdragaṇḍān [!] yuṣmān vihāyādya yiyāsur asmi ||
T09gopjatmu:870: viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṃ prayānti teṣāṃ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ || GoMk_101
T09gopjatmu:871: athāpsarasas tāḥ samastās tadgamanaviyogaśokaglapitaṛdayāḥ sasaṃbhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakuḍmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ prāhuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:872: asmāsu te kartum aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ kathaṃ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu |
T09gopjatmu:873: so 'nyena ekagrahaṇīyarūpaḥ śarīrakānena vayo grahīte || GoMk_102 ||
T09gopjatmu:874: gatvā tan nagaratrayaṃ yad api he svāminn ihāpy āgataḥ saṃprāptā viṣayopabhogamadhurāḥ saṃpattayas te ciram |
T09gopjatmu:875: gantavyaṃ na punas tvayā subahunā proktena kiṃ yāsi cet saṃsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṃ hi no duḥkhitaḥ || GoMk_103 ||
T09gopjatmu:878: kathaṃ te nu nivāryeran nivarteran kathaṃ nu vā || GoMk_104 ||
T09gopjatmu:879: niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdaḥ suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam |
T09gopjatmu:880: nivāraṇaṃ tatra tu ye prakurvate te śatravo 'mitratayā bhavanti ||
T09gopjatmu:881: divyaṃ prāpya sukhaṃ pure ramaṇake saṃcoditaḥ karmaṇā [!]
T09gopjatmu:883: saṃprāpto 'smi tataḥ svakarmakuśaleneṣṭaṃ puraṃ nandanaṃ tasmād āgatakasya yūyam adhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ || GoMk_106 ||
T09gopjatmu:884: tasmād ato me gamanaṃ bhavantyo [!] mā vārayadhvaṃ na hi no 'sty apāyaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:885: asmād viśeṣāṇi sukhāni manye lapsye 'ham ity uccalito 'ham adya ||
T09gopjatmu:886: ity atha mitrakanyako bodhisattvas tāsām apsarasāṃ hitam api vākyam ahitam ivāvajñayā tiraskṛtya tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan dadarśa mahārgaḍapraṭitaprakaṭapuṭacaturdvāradāruṇaṃ sureśvareṇāpy abhedyottuṅgāyasaviśālaprākārapariveṣṭitam antarbhramaccakramaṇḍalālokapramuktadamadamāśabdagambhīrabhairavam āyasaṃ
T09gopjatmu:888: saṃprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṃ ca visphoṭakapāṭabhāram |
T09gopjatmu:892: tatkarmavāyuprabhavair mahadbhiḥ kṣaṇād bhujāgrair iva saṃjaghāṭa ||
T09gopjatmu:893: aśrauṣīc ca pragāḍhavedanāviklavahṛdayapuruṣasyāntaḥprākārāntaratiraskṛtaparamabhīṣaṇanirnādaṃ sakalajanottrāsanam uccarantaṃ śrutvā ca dvāradeśaṃ tvaritamatir lalaṅgha |
T09gopjatmu:894: praviṣṭamātrasya tato dvitīyam āsphālitaṃ dvāram ivoparuddham |
T09gopjatmu:895: paryantakālānilavegaviddhaṃ dvāraṃ surāṇām iva vajrakalpam || GoMk_110 ||
T09gopjatmu:898: kṣaṇād abhūt tan nagaraṃ ca sarvaṃ bhrāntaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ sa dadarśa bhītaḥ
T09gopjatmu:899: tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sma tam atidāruṇākārapramāṇaṃ krūrajvalanamālāliṅgitam udāreṇa paṭupavanavikīryamāṇadhūmapaṭalāndhakāradurdinena sphuratsphuliṅgāvalikarāladarśanenāyasena mahatā bhramatā cakreṇa dārv iva pravidāryamāṇamūrdhānaṃ svaśiraḥpravigalitaśoṇitavasārasāhāramātravidhṛtaprāṇaśeṣaṃ samīpaṃ copagamyainaṃ paryapṛcchat |
T09gopjatmu:900: kiṃ nāgo 'si suro 'si kinnaravaro yakṣo 'si kiṃ mānuṣaḥ kiṃ vidyādharasainikaḥ kim asi vā daityaḥ piśāco 'si vā |
T09gopjatmu:901: kiṃ vākāri bhavāntareṣu bhavatā karmātiraudraṃ svayaṃ yasyāstivyasanaṃ duruttaram idaṃ bhujyaṃ phalaṃ krandayat || GoMk_112 ||
T09gopjatmu:903: nāhaṃ nāgo naiva yakṣo na devo daityo nāhaṃ nāpi gandharvarājā [!] |
T09gopjatmu:904: rakṣo nāhaṃ nāpi vidyādharo 'pi jātis tulyā saṃpratīhi tvayā naḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:906: kiṃ karma bhramatā tvayā kumatinā saṃsāradurge kṛtaṃ yenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi te cakraṃ bhramaty āyasam |
T09gopjatmu:908: nānāduṣkarakārikā bhagavatī saṃsārasaṃdarśikā tatra śreyaḥsukhopapādanaparā matsnehabaddhāśayā yāṃ loke pravadanti sādhumatayaḥ kṣetraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ daivāveśavaśād akāryagurukas tasyāṃ jananyām aham |
T09gopjatmu:909: sādho prāskhalayaṃ śiraḥpraharaṇaṃ pādena pāpāśayas tenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi me cakraṃ bhramaty āyasam || GoMk_115 ||
T09gopjatmu:910: atha bodhisattvas tasya puruṣasya pravacanapratodena saṃcoditahṛdayas tāṃ parajugupsām ātmany anupaśyann āha |
T09gopjatmu:911: anyaṃ jugupsāmy aham alpabuddhir ātmānam evādya nininda ajñaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:912: yeṣu svayaṃ doṣagaṇeṣu magnas tair eva lokaṃ katham aṅkayāmi || GoMk_116
T09gopjatmu:913: mayāpi yan mātari dakṣiṇīye [!] kṛto 'parādhaḥ puruṣādhamena |
T09gopjatmu:914: tasyaiva pāpasya phalāni bhoktum ullaṅghya toyāvalim āgato 'smi ||
T09gopjatmu:915: ity atha tasya vacanānantaram eva prabhinnanavakuvalayadalanirmalān nabhastalāt sajalajaladaninādagambhīradhīrodhvanir uccacāra |
T09gopjatmu:916: kiṃ na paśyati karmāṇi balavanti śarīriṇām |
T09gopjatmu:919: ye tyaktvā guruvākyam andhamatayaḥ pāpāśrayaṃ kurvate |
T09gopjatmu:920: muktāḥ karmabhir eva duḥkhanigaḍapracchedaśūraiḥ śubhair mānuṣyaṃ yad avāpya mūḍhamatayo dūre sthitā karmiṇaḥ || GoMk_119 ||
T09gopjatmu:921: atha tasya vacanānantaram eva karmānilavegotkṣiptam iva tac cakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayaṃ [!] bhramitum ārabdham |
T09gopjatmu:922: kṣaṇāt sa reje rudhirapravāhair mūrdhnā [!] cyutaiḥ snātasamastamūrtiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:924: tataḥ sa puruṣo hā heti mūrdhnā [!] pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena
T09gopjatmu:927: saṃtyajya kasmād u purāṇi tāni prāptas tv idaṃ sthānam anantaduḥkham ||
T09gopjatmu:928: devālayaṃ divyasukhopabhogaṃ ko nāma saṃprāpya śubhair atulyaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:932: saṃtyajya nāgā vyasanaṃ sahante yayā tayecchālatayāgato 'ham || GoMk_123
T09gopjatmu:934: yuddhe mriyante bahavo narendrā yayā tayecchālatayāgato 'ham || GoMk_124
T09gopjatmu:936: mahodadhau yānti narāḥ praṇāśaṃ yayā tayecchālatayāgato 'ham || GoMk_125
T09gopjatmu:938: munīśvarāṇāṃ vratam utsṛjanti yayā tayecchālatayāgato 'ham || GoMk_126 ||
T09gopjatmu:939: teṣāṃ munīnāṃ vigatavyathānāṃ deyaṃ kathaṃ pādarajo na mūrdhni |
T09gopjatmu:940: yair laṅghitās tīvraviṣapracaṇḍā āśāprapātā bahuduḥkhabhīmāḥ || GoMk_127
T09gopjatmu:941: kiṃ tad bhaved duḥkham atīvatīvraṃ kā vā vipattir bahuduḥkhayoniḥ |

T09gopjatmu:1527: maṇivedikākiraṇapāṭalormayo gṛhadīrghikā na ramayanti me manaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1529: diśatūttamāni jagaduttamadyutir mama maṅgalāni bhagavān sa eva tu |
T09gopjatmu:1530: na bhavāntare 'pi viraho yathā bhaved dayitena tena niravadyakarmaṇā ||
T09gopjatmu:1532: iti yaj jagāda manaso 'tivallabhaḥ samupasthitaṃ tad idam adya vaiśasam ||
T09gopjatmu:1534: tanum utsṛjāmi śikharād girer imām avaśiṣyate kim aparaṃ mamāyuṣaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:1535: yadi so 'dya naiti sukhasaumyadarśano mama mūrtimān avikalo manorathaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1536: svayam eva dhakṣyati mamedam āśrayaṃ hṛdayajvalas tumulaśokadāruṇaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:1537: iti sā rurāva kurarīva viklavā nayanāmbudurdinamukhī tapasvinī |
T09gopjatmu:1539: atha sumanā nāma yoṣid bodhisattvam anveṣamānā vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm anuprāptā dadarśa cainaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paramadāruṇām avasthām upagataṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tīvraśokāyāsavyathitahṛdayā provāca sphuritakiraṇacchāyāramyāḥ śiromaṇayaḥ kva te kva dayita gatās tās tā daṃṣṭrā bisāṅkuradhūsarāḥ
T09gopjatmu:1540: vapur upahataṃ daṇḍāghātair navotpalakomalaṃ vigalitahṛdayā (?) krūreṇaitat kṛpātmaka kena te || GoNā_34 ||
T09gopjatmu:1541: kiṃ dharmo 'stam itaḥ prajāhitakaraḥ kiṃ lokapālā mṛtāḥ tejaḥ kopaviṣātisaṅgarabhasaṃ kiṃ proṣitaṃ bhoginām |
T09gopjatmu:1542: śūnyaṃ kiṃ nu patiprabhābhir adhunā niḥśuklamūlaṃ jagad yena tvaṃ vyasanaṃ duruttaram idaṃ prāpto vināśāya te || GoNā_35 ||
T09gopjatmu:1543: nāsīt kasya dayā tvayi praharato 'nāryasya śāntātmani krauryaṃ tvayy api nāma sādhucarite pāpātmanāṃ jāyate |
T09gopjatmu:1544: tvām āyāsayataḥ kathaṃ na patitau tasya prakoṣṭhāt karau nāthānātha ivāpadaṃ katham imāṃ prāptas tvam āyāsinīm || GoNā_36 ||
T09gopjatmu:1545: bodhisattvas tu pratyagrakopaśokakaluṣitādhyāśayātmanām avetya tūṣṇīm eva babhūva || sā punar abravīt ||
T09gopjatmu:1546: kasyāpriyaṃ jīvitam ādyajātaṃ kālena kelīṃ saha kaḥ karoti |
T09gopjatmu:1549: āditsate krūraviṣaṃ bhujaṅgaṃ kaḥ puṣpadāmākṛtivipralabdhaḥ || GoNā_38 ||
T09gopjatmu:1550: udadhiparikhām adyaivaināṃ dahāmi vasundharāṃ sanaganagaragrāmārāmāṃ svadṛṣṭihutāśanaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1551: na mama hṛdayaṃ śāntiṃ yāti tvadapriyatāḍitaṃ dahati yadi na krodhāgnir māṃ purā niravagrahaḥ atha bodhisattvas tāṃ tapasvinīm aviṣahyakopāgnipradīptamānasāṃ hlādayann iva tadāmṛtaśiśirābhir vāgbhir ity abravīt ||
T09gopjatmu:1552: alam alaṃ mā gā bhadre vai kopasya cetovidāhinaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1553: prakṛtiduḥkheṣu ko bhūyaḥ sattveṣu duḥkhāni cintayet || GoNā_40 ||
T09gopjatmu:1554: duḥkhahetau vartamāneṣu śocyeṣu saṃkleśabhāgiṣu kaḥ parākramet || duḥkhāya svahitakramārteṣu dehiṣu na mama daṃṣṭrotpāṭanād duḥkhaṃ na ca
T09gopjatmu:1555: daṇḍasaṃpātajā rujāḥ || duḥkhayanti mānasaṃ caṇḍi tvadvākkarkaśās tudanti mām || api ca kānte ||
T09gopjatmu:1557: vayaṃ tadaiva lokānām ādheyakriyatāṃ gatāḥ || GoNā_41 ||
T09gopjatmu:1558: kopavahnimlāyamānā punaḥ saiva tvam anyeva lakṣyase ||
T09gopjatmu:1561: karmāparādhajanitaṃ yadi duḥkham etat kopāvakāśa iha ko nu mama dvijātau |
T09gopjatmu:1562: karmendhanoddhataśikhāśakalākulebhyaḥ kupyet kathaṃ na matimān narakānalebhyaḥ || GoNā_43
T09gopjatmu:1564: svagṛhān eva gacchasva saṃtyāgaṃ ca kuruṣva me || GoNā_44 ||
T09gopjatmu:1565: sā bhartur abhiprāyaṃ saṃpādayantī tadvacanāpyāyitahṛdayā vigatakopasaṃrambhā babhūva ||
T09gopjatmu:1566: kopoparāgavigame vivṛto 'dhimātraḥ snehaḥ priye viṣamavartini nāgavadhvā |
T09gopjatmu:1567: udghāṭitābhrapaṭalasphuṭadigvibhāge khe niḥsapatna iva candramasaḥ prakāśaḥ || GoNā_45 ||
T09gopjatmu:1569: kuto me duḥkhabhāginyā gehaṃ ārya tvayā vinā |
T09gopjatmu:1570: ihaiva śoṣam eṣyāmi yā gatis tava sā mama || GoNā_46 ||
T09gopjatmu:1572: kānta kena sukhenāhaṃ drakṣyāmi svajanaṃ punaḥ || GoNā_47 ||
T09gopjatmu:1573: sukhe samānatāṃ gatvā duḥkhe jahyāṃ yadi priyam |
T09gopjatmu:1574: anāryām akṛtajñāṃ māṃ dhārayiṣyati bhūḥ katham || GoNā_48 ||
T09gopjatmu:1575: pratibhāti jagac chūnyaṃ tvayā virahitaṃ mama |
T09gopjatmu:1576: tvaṃ me jīvitasarvasvaṃ tvaṃ bandhus tvaṃ parāyaṇam || GoNā_49 ||
T09gopjatmu:1580: parikleśam imaṃ soḍhum akṣamā tvam anindite || GoNā_51 ||
T09gopjatmu:1581: mayi sneho 'sti yadi te duḥkhaṃ me yadi necchasi |
T09gopjatmu:1582: adṛṣṭam adya māṃ kṛtvā tad gaccha tvaṃ svam ālayam || GoNā_52 ||
T09gopjatmu:1583: atha sā tair bodhisattvavaco'dbhir ākleditahṛdayā duḥkhadaurmanasyaparyākulamānasā niśīthe kāśikārājam upetya karuṇākulatarākṣareṇa vacasā kṛtāñjalir avocat ||
T09gopjatmu:1584: āpadgatānāṃ vyasanakṣayāya tvaṃ pañcamaḥ pārthiva lokapālaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1585: trāyasva mām āpadi vartamānāṃ dīnām anāthāṃ jagadekanātha || GoNā_53 ||
T09gopjatmu:1586: atha sa rājā tad atibhāsuraṃ vapur avalokya kim idaṃ kathaṃ cety utpannajātasaṃbhramaḥ sādaram utthāya paryaṅkapṛṣṭhāt tāṃ nāgayoṣitam etad avocat ||
T09gopjatmu:1587: dhyāmīkṛtya maṇipradīpakiraṇān etad vapus te sthitaṃ vyāhārasphuṭacitravarṇakaraṇo divyaprabhāvaś ca te |
T09gopjatmu:1588: kā nu tvaṃ karavāṇi kiṃ bhavati te brūhi tvadājñām imāṃ mālāṃ phulladalām ivādya śirasā samyak pratīcchāmy aham || GoNā_54 ||
T09gopjatmu:1589: athāsau bhujagavadhūs tena tasya rājño 'bhijātyapeśalena vacasā samānanditamanasā provāca
T09gopjatmu:1590: āśāvaśānāṃ naradeva ko 'nyo manorathaṃ pūrayituṃ samarthaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1591: tyaktvā bhavantaṃ jagato hitāya prajāpater vaṃśam ivāvatīrṇam || GoNā_55
T09gopjatmu:1593: āpadgataṃ mānada pannagendraṃ trāyasva kṛtyaṃ mama tad garīyaḥ || GoNā_56
T09gopjatmu:1594: rājovāca || bhagini kas tavāsau bhujagavaraḥ || sā provāca ||
T09gopjatmu:1595: bhartā mama prāṇadhaneśvaro 'sau nyāyopradeṣṭā ca gurur garīyān |
T09gopjatmu:1596: piteva nityaṃ hitasaṃvidhātāsukhe ca viśrambhaniratyayaś ca || GoNā_57 ||
T09gopjatmu:1597: atha sa bhūpatis tena tasyāḥ svāmyanurāgaśībhareṇa caritenābhiprasāditaḥ
T09gopjatmu:1599: bhaktir bhartari darśitā ghanarasā dākṣiṇyam unmīlitaṃ premodbhāvitam āpadi sthirataraṃ prodghāṭitā bhadratā |
T09gopjatmu:1600: dharmo nyāyaparigraheṇa paramāṃ vṛddhiṃ tvayāpādito loke sādhupativratatvam iti te khyātiḥ sthitā śāśvatī || GoNā_58 ||
T09gopjatmu:1601: tyaktvā priyaṃ jīvitam apy ato 'haṃ puṇyaprabhāvopanataṃ ca rājyam |
T09gopjatmu:1602: saṃpūrayiṣyāmi manorathaṃ te paśyādya bhadre dayitaṃ vimuktam || GoNā_59
T09gopjatmu:1603: atha sa rājā tasya brāhmaṇasyāntikāt taṃ nāgarājānaṃ mahatā mūlyena niṣkrīya parameṇa .............. sapatnīkaṃ svabhavanaṃ praveśya
T09gopjatmu:1604: mahārhasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭam abhyarcayām āsa || atha bodhisattvas tena tasya rājño 'tyadbhutena niṣkāraṇopakārasaṃbhrameṇākṛṣṭamanāḥ provācainam ||
T09gopjatmu:1605: asaṃstute nāma tavāyam ādaro mayi prasādasthirabhaktipeśalaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1606: kṛtopakāreṣv api yo na dṛśyate pṛthagjaneṣu sukhānubuddhiṣu || GoNā_60 ||
T09gopjatmu:1608: guṇe vivardhasva tad uttarottarair guṇeṣu bhadraṃ jagatāṃ avasthitam ||
T09gopjatmu:1609: iti saṃrādhya rājānaṃ tam asau bhujageśvaraḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1610: anubaddho dayitayā kṛpayeva gṛhān yayau || GoNā_62 ||
T09gopjatmu:1612: Puṇyarāśi = GoPr based on the edition by Michael Hahn. "Puṇyarāśyavadāna Ō Another Legend
T09gopjatmu:1613: by Gopadatta?", Frank-Richard Hamm Memorial Volume, October 8, 1990, ed.
T09gopjatmu:1614: H. Eimer, Bonn 1990 (Indica et Tibetica, 21), pp. 103-132.
T09gopjatmu:1615: 10. Puṇyarāśi athāśoko mahārāja upaguptaṃ yatiṃ gurum |
T09gopjatmu:1616: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayac ca tathādarāt || GoPr_1 ||
T09gopjatmu:1617: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitam |
T09gopjatmu:1618: tad yathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati || GoPr_2 ||
T09gopjatmu:1619: iti tena narendreṇa prārthite sa jinātmajaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1620: upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat || GoPr_3 ||
T09gopjatmu:1621: śṛṇu sādhu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditam |
T09gopjatmu:1622: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā caivaṃ śubhe cara || GoPr_4 ||
T09gopjatmu:1624: saṃbuddhe sadgurau tasmāt kartavyam upakārakam || GoPr_5 ||
T09gopjatmu:1626: kadā cit tāv ubhau grāmaṃ gacchantau saṃgatau pathi || GoPr_6 ||
T09gopjatmu:1628: tāṃ samīkṣya tayor ekaḥ praṇatvaivaṃ tam abravīt || GoPr_7 ||
T09gopjatmu:1630: bhāgyena dṛśyate 'smābhir adya mitra praṇamyatām || GoPr_8 ||
T09gopjatmu:1631: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvāparas tam abravīt |
T09gopjatmu:1632: aho bata mahān mitra pāparāśir ayaṃ nv iti || GoPr_9 ||
T09gopjatmu:1633: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā prathamaḥ sa upāsakaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1634: karṇau pidhāya hastābhyāṃ tam evaṃ paryabhāṣata || GoPr_10 ||
T09gopjatmu:1635: dhik tvām asadbuddhim asatpralāpinam [!] evaṃ hy api tvaṃ pratibhāṣase 'tra |
T09gopjatmu:1636: kasmān muneḥ śāstur upāsako 'pi saddharmamūrtiṃ pratinindase 'dya ||
T09gopjatmu:1637: kathaṃ na jihvā patitā tavānanād asatpralāpāpahatā tapasvinī |
T09gopjatmu:1638: apuṇyarāśir bhagavān iti bruvan kathaṃ na magnas tvam are rasātale ||
T09gopjatmu:1639: dhig apraśastām asatāṃ duratyayāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ prakṛtiṃ calācalām |
T09gopjatmu:1640: vimarśam aprāpya yatheṣṭacāriṇī karoti yā lokam apāyagocaram || GoPr_13 ||
T09gopjatmu:1641: sudāruṇair āyudhabhīmadarśanair arātibhiḥ sārdham aho varaṃ gatam |
T09gopjatmu:1642: tvayā suhṛcchadmanigūḍhapāpmanā padaṃ na caikaṃ vitathapralāpinā ||
T09gopjatmu:1643: namanti yaṃ brahmavido maharṣayaḥ punāti yo viśvam idaṃ vṛṣāṃśubhiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1644: apuṇyarāśir yadi sa vratīśvaras tathāgataḥ puṇyanidhiḥ kuto 'paraḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:1645: muneḥ paroddhāranimittamātram apy upaiti yasyoddhṛtakalmaṣo 'pi san |
T09gopjatmu:1646: sa yogaparyantavidāṃ dhuri sthito na puṇyarāśir yadi ko nv ihāparaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:1647: na yasya buddhiḥ pratihanyate kva cin na ca praheyāvayavo 'vaśiṣyate |
T09gopjatmu:1648: na cāsti saṅgo jagadarthasādhane sa puṇyarāśir na kathaṃkathāntaśaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:1650: prāgalbhavacasā bhūya āyuṣmantaṃ tam abravīt || GoPr_18 ||
T09gopjatmu:1651: hitakāmyatayā niratyayaṃ vacanaṃ kāmam idaṃ sakhe tava |
T09gopjatmu:1652: anuyujya tathāpi śobhate vitathaṃ sādhur udīrayan bhavān || GoPr_19 ||
T09gopjatmu:1653: mama bhaktir udāraśāsane sugate yā paramānukampake |
T09gopjatmu:1654: viditā tava sā tathāpi māṃ sahasā saumya kathaṃ vigarhase || GoPr_20 ||
T09gopjatmu:1655: āpātālpasukhābhimānarasikaṃ paryantariktāśrayaṃ sāyāsaṃ sabhayaṃ prasaṅgavirasaṃ dhig laukikaṃ saṃgatam |
T09gopjatmu:1656: yan nāmaivam akāraṇoddhataruṣo mithyāvikalpair hataṃ gacchaty ekapade kṣayaṃ paricayaṃ vikṣipya mūrdhno 'ntikam || GoPr_21 ||
T09gopjatmu:1657: etat tenoditaṃ śrutvā prathamaḥ sa upāsakaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1658: anyathā tadvaco matvā manasaivaṃ vyacintayat || GoPr_22 ||
T09gopjatmu:1659: aho hy anyad anenoktam anyan mayā vikalpitam |
T09gopjatmu:1661: dṛṣṭvā sa ca sahāyas taṃ lajjāvanamitānanam |
T09gopjatmu:1662: tadabhiprāyam ājñātuṃ prasahya caivam abravīt || GoPr_24 ||
T09gopjatmu:1663: sādho kiṃ manyase hy atra yat te lajjāhataṃ mukham |
T09gopjatmu:1664: tāvat te yad abhiprāyaṃ tat pracakṣva mamāgrataḥ || GoPr_25 ||
T09gopjatmu:1665: tasyaitad vacanaṃ śrutvā sa āyuṣmān upāsakaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1667: cittaṃ yatra prasādya kṣaṇam api manujo 'nuttame dakṣiṇīye śrīsaubhāgyaprakarṣaṃ bhavagatiṣu paraṃ prāpya nirdvandvaramyam |
T09gopjatmu:1668: paścād ālokya lokaṃ vitathavilapitaṃ pratyayagrāhamātraṃ jñātvā prāpnoti śāntaṃ katham iva na mahān puṇyarāśir bhavet saḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:1669: dattvā palālaśakalasrajam agrasattve lebhe bhavopaśamaśāntisukhāni nārī |
T09gopjatmu:1670: yasminn acintyacaritātiśayaprabhāve kiṃ puṇyarāśir ayam ity avidagdham etat || GoPr_28 ||
T09gopjatmu:1671: kośātakīkusumam api pradāya stūpe muneḥ paramakāruṇikasya yasya |
T09gopjatmu:1674: yasmai pāṃśupradānaṃ prakṛticalamanā bālakaiḥ saṃpradāya sphītāṃ martyendralakṣmīm anavanatasitacchattrahāsābhirāmām
T09gopjatmu:1675: saṃprāpyātītacintaṃ padam abhayam asaddāhaparyantaśāntaṃ lebhe paścān narendraḥ katham iva sa na bhoḥ puṇyarāśir maharṣiḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:1676: prasahya paṅkāṅkam ṛṣer varāhaḥ [!] caitye vapur yasya ciraṃ sa eva |
T09gopjatmu:1677: tasyaiva dharmasya sudharmatāsau yadādhipatyena bhavād vimuktaḥ || GoPr_31
T09gopjatmu:1678: kiyān prasādo jaḍacetanānāṃ sakhe tiraścāṃ guṇaniścayo vā |
T09gopjatmu:1679: kṣetrasya tasyaiva tu sā vibhūtir yenātra sattvāḥ saphalī bhavanti ||
T09gopjatmu:1680: dṛṣṭvā lokavilocanotsavasukhāṃ saṃśāntasarvoddhavāṃ vyāmābhāpariveṣiṇīṃ bhagavato buddhasya mūrtiṃ purā |
T09gopjatmu:1681: harṣotkampigalaś cukūja madhuraṃ preṅkhatkalāpaḥ śikhī taddhetoś ca śamaṃ jagāma sa śikhī dhārāmbusikto yathā || GoPr_33 ||
T09gopjatmu:1682: maṅgalyatvam acintyayogamahatāṃ sarvārthasiddhyāvahaṃ buddhānāṃ tad udīkṣyatāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃmohanidrācchidām |
T09gopjatmu:1683: atyantopaśamāvahaṃ bhavati yat tiryaggatānām api prāg evābhimukhāśayasya viduṣaḥ śāstur guṇāmbhonidheḥ manye darśanam eva tad guṇavatāṃ teṣām avandhyodayaṃ sarvākāraparopakāramadhuraṃ pūrvābhisaṃskārajam
T09gopjatmu:1684: pradveṣopahatāśayān api janān saṃprāpayaty uttamaṃ sthānaṃ sarvabhavopasargavigamād ekāntaśāntaṃ śivam || GoPr_35 ||
T09gopjatmu:1685: śrutvā nāma tathāgatasya makaraḥ sāṃyātrikebhyaḥ purā saṃpṛktāsyapuṭo mamāra sugate cetaḥ prasādya kṣaṇam |
T09gopjatmu:1686: taddhetoḥ saritāṃ patiṃ parimitaṃ nītvā punar dustaraṃ janmāmbhonidhim uttatāra vipulaṃ niḥsṛtya mārge plavam || GoPr_36 ||
T09gopjatmu:1689: kṛtvā vyāghrabhayān namo bhagavate buddhāya sarvātmanā nāmnaivānupamasya puṇyamahatīm ālokya nāndīṃ pumān |
T09gopjatmu:1690: niḥśeṣavyasanāndhakāragahanapradhvaṃsinīṃ prāptavāñ chāntiṃ kām api vāgatītaviṣayāṃ prahlādasaṃvardhanīm iti bhuvanamahimnām ākaraṃ śāśvatānāṃ tam anupamaviśeṣācintyacaryārahasyam |
T09gopjatmu:1691: kim api katham apīśaṃ śaṃkaraṃ prāptum āryaṃ padam amaram ahāryaṃ puṇyarāśiṃ vadāmi || GoPr_39
T09gopjatmu:1692: iti tadgaditaṃ śrutvā sa itara upāsakaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:1693: tam āyuṣmantam ālokya punar evaṃ samabravīt || GoPr_40 ||
T09gopjatmu:1694: samyag abhihitaṃ sādho bhavatātra tathāpi ca |
