T09gopjatmu:2393: prabhutvam āsīj jagatāṃ tv abādhithaṃ vibhūtisaṃbhogasukheṣu bhūriṣu ||
T09gopjatmu:2395: na tasya mātsaryatamo'vaguṇṭhanaṃ babhūva gātreṣv api mānasaṃ yadā |
T09gopjatmu:2396: tadā kathaivoparatāsukhāgate tṛṇopame śokanibandhane dhane || GoSd_4 ||
T09gopjatmu:2397: taṃ kila mahātmānam anyatamaḥ pārthivo 'tṛptaḥ svarājyaśriyā parityaktadharmayaśāḥ sukhasādhanopāyadāruṇaḥ svarājyād uccālayitum upacakrame |
T09gopjatmu:2398: saṃprāpya bhogān mahato 'py anāryāḥ panthānam āryācaritaṃ vilaṅghya |
T09gopjatmu:2399: tṛṣṇāparītāḥ karuṇātmakeṣu sādhuṣv api krodhaviṣaṃ vamanti || GoSd_5 ||
T09gopjatmu:2400: bhaiṣajyavṛkṣā iva ye kadā cit kva cit kathaṃ cij jagato hitāya |
T09gopjatmu:2401: bhavanti tān apy upataptacittāḥ krodhāgninā kāpuruṣā dahanti || GoSd_6 ||
T09gopjatmu:2402: kurvīta ko nāma manuṣya āryaḥ sacetanas teṣu manaḥpradoṣam |
T09gopjatmu:2403: yeṣāṃ yaśobhiḥ kumudāvadātair udbhāsitānīva digantarāṇi || GoSd_7 ||
T09gopjatmu:2404: atha dharaṇirajobhiḥ śārikākaṇṭhadhūmrais turagakhuranipātaprodgataiś chādayan kham |
T09gopjatmu:2405: sa nṛpatir upatasthe mattamātaṅgasainyair upavanatarupūgān ārujan meghanīlān || GoSd_8 ||
T09gopjatmu:2407: sa nṛpabalasamūho nagnanistriṃśapattrasphuritaravimayūkhas tatpuraṃ saṃrurodha || GoSd_9 ||
T09gopjatmu:2408: upanatam api puṇyair vipralambhāvasānaṃ dhig anupaśamakāri śrīsukhaṃ pārthivānām |
T09gopjatmu:2409: piśitam iva vipūti kravyabhugmaṇḍalānāṃ yad iha bhavati puṃsāṃ vairavairasya mūlam || GoSd_10
T09gopjatmu:2410: atha bodhisattvaḥ prāg eva viditaviṣayadoṣavairavairaḥ saṃrambhavipralabhādyanarthabhūyiṣṭhaṃ rājyam atimanyamānaḥ svasukhasaṃbhogābhiṣvaṅgadainyānupakliṣṭamānasaś cintayāṃ babhūva |
T09gopjatmu:2411: dhig astv anāryaṃ viṣayāśrayaṃ sukhaṃ samīraṇoddhūtalatāntacañcalam |
T09gopjatmu:2412: upāsate yatra nibaddhamānasā narā daśāṃ bandhujanopatāpinīm || GoSd_11 ||
T09gopjatmu:2414: śakto 'rātibalaṃ vihantum akhilaṃ bāhudvitīyo 'py ahaṃ rakṣed akṣatacāriṇī yadi kṛpā māteva māṃ nāpadi || GoSd_12 ||
T09gopjatmu:2415: yā vā śrīr adhigamyate paravadhavyāsaṅgadagdhātmanā tāṃ vāñched bhramaropagītakusumāṃ ko vadhyamālām iva |
T09gopjatmu:2417: prāg eva vyasanāturasya jagato yo 'haṃ hitāyodyataḥ || GoSd_13 ||
T09gopjatmu:2418: api ca rājye 'paro yadi mama praṇayaṃ karoti pūjyo mayā nanu viśeṣata eva rājā |
T09gopjatmu:2419: rājyāśrayaṃ khalu parārtham ahaṃ bibharmi saṃkleśabhāram imam āyataduḥkhahetum || GoSd_14
T09gopjatmu:2420: atithir iva yato 'yaṃ mānanīyo narendro madupahitavibhūtiprārthanākṛṣṭacetāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2421: upacitakuśalatvāc cānukampāviśeṣāt suta iva vinayārthaṃ ko 'tra
T09gopjatmu:2423: unmocayaty eva balāc ca yo māṃ rājyābhidhānād vyasanapratānāt |
T09gopjatmu:2424: yady atra kuryāṃ manasaḥ prakopaṃ pāpo 'paraḥ ko 'tha mayā samaḥ syāt ||
T09gopjatmu:2425: rājyasya doṣāvayave niveśaṃ prakhyāpayan hanti yaśaḥsukhāni |
T09gopjatmu:2426: mām arthataḥ śikṣayate narendro rājyābhidhāne tamasi bhramantam || GoSd_17
T09gopjatmu:2427: tyaktavyam etena ca kāraṇena kṣitīśvaraśrīsukham ātmakāmaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2428: yad atra saktasya janasya vairabhayaprasaṅgāḥ śirasi sphuranti || GoSd_18
T09gopjatmu:2429: yo vāham utsṛjya tapovanāni nirantarāyāṇy abhitaḥ śivāni |
T09gopjatmu:2430: gṛhābhidhānaṃ bhayam āvasāmi nārhāmi nāhaṃ vyasanāny amūni || GoSd_19 ||
T09gopjatmu:2432: yāsyāmi śāntāni vanāny ato 'haṃ vivekajaprītinibandhanāni || GoSd_20 ||
T09gopjatmu:2433: kalyāṇamitraṃ yata eva rājā mamādya naiṣkramyasukhodayāya |
T09gopjatmu:2434: kalyāṇam evāstv anayo 'py ato 'sya sabandhumitrasya śaracchatāni ||
T09gopjatmu:2435: mā gā garvaṃ mahimnaḥ kṣitipatir aham ity ujjhyatāṃ vipralambhaḥ pratyāsannopatāpām anuvahasi vṛthā bhaṅginīṃ kiṃ nayājñām |
T09gopjatmu:2436: rājyaṃ tyaktavyam eva vyasanaparigataṃ nātyajas tvaṃ kimarthaṃ śaṅke daurjanyam itthaṃ mama nṛpatir ayaṃ kṣāpayiṣyaty ayatnaḥ || GoSd_22
T09gopjatmu:2437: kadā tyaktvā gehaṃ kukṛtaśatasaṃbādhavirasaṃ vane vatsyāmīti praśamasukhasaṃbhogasubhage |
T09gopjatmu:2438: vitarkā ye bhūtāḥ suciram anubaddhā mama mateḥ prasiddhās te diṣṭyā kṣitipatim imaṃ prāpya na cirāt || GoSd_23 ||
T09gopjatmu:2439: iti viniścitya bodhisattvo janmāntarābhyastanaiṣkramyasukhābhyudayaparicayo mṛga iva vāgurāvarodhanirgamopalambhodbhūtapramodaḥ samapanītarājyaśrīsūcakālaṃkāravibhramakāyabhāralaghuviviktavigrahaḥ parair aparijñātatapovanagamanaprayojanaḥ saṃrūḍhapraṇayaviśrambhasnehabahumānaniratyayaṃ ca bandhuvargaṃ
T09gopjatmu:2440: svapuṇyabalāvaṣṭambhopanatasukhopabhogyāṃ ca rājalakṣmīṃ paryuṣitopabhogamalinamlānakusumabandhanām iva srajaṃ parityajyānytamad viviktam āśramapadam alaṃcakāra |
T09gopjatmu:2441: āhūyamāna iva pallavināṃ drumāṇāṃ śākhākaraiḥ svakusumābharaṇābhirāmaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2442: śāntaṃ vanāntam upagamya sa bodhisattvaḥ prāpto 'mṛtaṃ nṛpasukhair anavāptapūrvam || GoSd_24
T09gopjatmu:2443: yāny eva śokaparidevamukhāni loke kāmātmanām anucitopaśamotsavānām |
T09gopjatmu:2444: tāny eva nāma dadhati praśamapriyāṇāṃ prītiṃ nirāmiṣasukhapraṇayānavadyām
T09gopjatmu:2445: puṣpādhivāsaśucibhiḥ sa vanāntavātaiḥ saṃvījitaḥ prativinodya śarīrakhedam |
T09gopjatmu:2446: dhyātvā pramādamalināṃ manujendralakṣmīṃ saṃvegam eva manasi kṣitipaḥ pupoṣa || GoSd_26 ||
T09gopjatmu:2447: kṛtvā namaḥ sa bhuvanatrayaśaṅkarebhyaḥ sarvātmanā daśasu dikṣu tathāgatebhyaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2448: amlānaśādvalakuthāparibhogaramye mūle taroḥ kṣitipatir niṣasāda madhye || GoSd_27 ||
T09gopjatmu:2450: viviktasaṃbhogasukhāny araṇyāny ālokya viśrānta iva kṣitīśaḥ || GoSd_28 ||
T09gopjatmu:2452: sānūni paśyan sa mahīdharāṇām ayatnaramyāṇi mudaṃ jagāma || GoSd_29 ||
T09gopjatmu:2453: āliṅgitān puṣpabharālasābhiḥ snehād iva prāṇasamāṃl latābhiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2454: mahīruhān bhūripalāśanīlān ālokya reme sa mahīmahendraḥ || GoSd_30 ||
T09gopjatmu:2456: nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sa nṛpo 'bhireme sarāṃsi pāṭhīnakulākulāni || GoSd_31 ||
T09gopjatmu:2458: nirīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣitipaḥ praharṣaṃ jagāma saṃśāntamanovikāraḥ || GoSd_32 ||
T09gopjatmu:2462: kva caiva cetovinibandhanāni śāntāny araṇyāśrayiṇāṃ sukhāni || GoSd_34 ||
T09gopjatmu:2464: viṣajya yasmin manasaḥ pravṛttiṃ kṛpāspadatvaṃ viduṣāṃ vrajanti || GoSd_35
T09gopjatmu:2465: avanataśikhair vānīrāṇāṃ drumais taṭarohibhiḥ kṛtaparikaraśrīsaṃbhogāḥ praśāntarayoddhavāḥ
T09gopjatmu:2466: haritapulināḥ śaṣpodbhedair jharaiḥ saritaḥ śivāḥ kṣititalapatiḥ paśyaṃl lebhe ratiṃ sa nirāmiṣām vitathaviṣayakrodhābhyāsaprayogamalīmasaṃ hṛdayam asatāṃ śānte 'raṇye ratiṃ katham eṣyati
T09gopjatmu:2467: sa tu narapatir gotrotkarṣaprabhāvaparigrahād viṣayavimukhaḥ prītiṃ bheje parāṃ vijane vane prakṛticapalā naikāpāyā nirantaradāruṇā na khalu hṛdayaṃ no jñānārthaṃ haranti vibhūtayaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2468: apagatamanaḥsaṃkṣobhāṇāṃ vanāntam upeyuṣāṃ bhavati tu satāṃ pūrvābhyāsān matiḥ praguṇā śubhe hariṇacaraṇakṣuṇṇopāntāḥ saśādvalanirjharāḥ kusumaśabalair viśvākhātais taraṅgitapādapāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2469: muditavihagaśreṇīcitradhvanipratināditā manasi na mudaṃ kasyādadhyuḥ śivā vanarājayaḥ || GoSd_39
T09gopjatmu:2470: praśamavidhure nityodvegaprade gṛhacārake viṣayamarutā vyādhūtānāṃ hatopaniṣatsukham |
T09gopjatmu:2471: uparatajanakṣobhāyāsaprakāmasukhe vane vrajati tu manaḥ sadyaḥ śāntiṃ kukāryasamākulam || athānyatamo brāhmaṇo dāridryaduḥkhābhyāhatas tatpratīkāracikīrṣayā mandotsāho 'pi bodhisattvam ekam ārtāyanam avagamya tadviṣayāntam upagacchan mārgaparibhraṃśaparyākulātmā tatas tataḥ paribhraman kṣudduḥkhopaglapitatanur adhvaklamaviklavāvidheyagurutaracaraṇavigrahas tad āśramapadam āsasāda |
T09gopjatmu:2472: dṛṣṭvā cainaṃ bodhisattvaś cirābhyāgatasnigdhabāndhavasnehātiriktavātsalyapeśalayā pibann iva dṛṣṭyā pratyudgamyābhivādya ca kṛtapratisaṃmodanam āgamanaprayojanaṃ paryapṛcchat
T09gopjatmu:2474: yaḥ sarvado nāma bhuvi prasiddho yathārthanāmā naralokapālaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2475: kīrtyā samāhūta ivāsmi tasya prāptas tam ārtāyanam īkṣamāṇaḥ || GoSd_41 ||
T09gopjatmu:2476: trātā sa eva vyasanāturāṇāṃ vanīpakānāṃ sa ca bandhur ekaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2477: tam eva caikaṃ vyapadiśya sādhum anyatra maunavratam eti vāṇī || GoSd_42
T09gopjatmu:2478: tat tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sa kṛpāpeśalāśayaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2480: atha sa mahātmā dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ provāca |
T09gopjatmu:2482: bhraṣṭaiśvaryaḥ sa bhūpālas tapase vanam āśritaḥ || GoSd_44 ||
T09gopjatmu:2483: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ samīhitārthapratyāśāpraṇayabhaṅgadainyākrāntamānasaḥ sahasā pṛthivyāṃ nipapāta paraṃ ca saṃmoham upajagāma |
T09gopjatmu:2485: dehināṃ moham āyānti hetunā yena kena cit || GoSd_45 ||
T09gopjatmu:2486: atha bodhisattvas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śītābhir adbhiḥ pariṣiñcya pratilabdhasaṃjñaṃ samāśvāsayann abravīt |
T09gopjatmu:2488: ahaṃ sarvaṃdado rājā mā śucas tvam iha dvija || GoSd_46 ||
T09gopjatmu:2489: sarvaṃdado nāma kathaṃ kadā vā yasya svadehe 'pi manaḥprasaṅgaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2490: yathārthanāmā tv adhunā bhaviṣyāmy ahaṃ tvadabhyāgamanotsavena || GoSd_47
T09gopjatmu:2492: baddhvā māṃ dehy atas tasmai sa tvāṃ samtoṣayiṣyati || GoSd_48 ||
T09gopjatmu:2494: mamopayogaṃ guṇapakṣasiddhaye śarīrasaṃjñaḥ kalir adya yāsyati || GoSd_49
T09gopjatmu:2495: jarārujāmṛtyukhalūrikām imāṃ tanuṃ samāśritya sa hanta yo 'dya me |
T09gopjatmu:2496: manoratho brāhmaṇamukhya pūryatāṃ tava prabhāvād abhivāñchitaś ciram ||
T09gopjatmu:2497: prītir nṛpasya tava cārthaviśeṣasiddhiḥ saṃpatsyate mama ca pāramitāprakarṣaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2498: ekaṃ śarīram atisṛjya vipatparītaṃ paśyotsavātiśayam āpatitaṃ krameṇa ||
T09gopjatmu:2500: dehe kṛtāntamakarāsyapuṭātithau ca naikopasargavihite vidhir asti ko 'nyaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2501: kāyād asārād aham adya sāraṃ bhavantam āsādya samujjihīrṣuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2502: manorathaṃ tat saphalaṃ kuruṣva tvam adya me vipra cirānubaddham ||
T09gopjatmu:2503: evam astv iti pāpātmā pratiśuśrāva sa dvijaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2506: viṣayair upataptānāṃ pāpaṃ kiṃ nāma duṣkaram || GoSd_55 ||
T09gopjatmu:2507: ekaḥ parārthaṃ pradadau svadehaṃ samādade 'nyaḥ param ātmahetoḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2508: aho vikṛṣṭaṃ caritaṃ narāṇāṃ guṇeṣu doṣeṣu ca sādarāṇām || GoSd_56 ||
T09gopjatmu:2509: taṃ bodhisattvaṃ vinibadhya gāḍhaṃ paścādbhujaṃ cauram iva dvijātiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2515: sudurlabham darśanam asya sarvathā vilocanaprītikarasya dehinām |
T09gopjatmu:2516: vilepur ity udgataśokakātarāḥ pragāḍhaśokā munayo vanaukasaḥ || GoSd_60 ||
T09gopjatmu:2518: praveśayām āsa puraṃ sa yasmin mahīpatis tṣṭhati tatsapatnaḥ || GoSd_61 ||
T09gopjatmu:2519: yam adrākṣur netraiḥ purayuvatayaḥ snehavikacair gajaskandhārūḍhaṃ patim iva surāṇāṃ narapatim
T09gopjatmu:2520: tam evāpaśyaṃs tāḥ paravaśagataṃ valkaladharaṃ mukhaiḥ śokāyāsastimitagurupakṣmāntanayanaiḥ taṃ mattavāraṇagatiṃ kanakāvadātaṃ prāṃśuṃ sumerum iva lakṣaṇaratnacitram |
T09gopjatmu:2521: cīrāmbaraṃ vṛjinadīrghajaṭākalāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpo ripur adhīratayā cakampe || GoSd_63 ||
T09gopjatmu:2522: tathābhūtaṃ cainam avekṣya sādhvasākulitamatiś cintayām āsa |
T09gopjatmu:2523: ko nv eṣa kāñcanaśilātalacāruvakṣāḥ kṣāmodaro bhujagabhogavilambibāhuḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2524: pratyādiśann iva kukāryasamākulaṃ māṃ prāpto yuvāpi vinayapratipattidhīraḥ || GoSd_64 ||
T09gopjatmu:2527: baddhaś ca nāma ca na dainyaviṣādavaśyas tejonidhiḥ praśamam udgiratīva cāyam || GoSd_65 ||
T09gopjatmu:2528: atha sa brāhmaṇādhamas taṃ rājānam abravīt |
T09gopjatmu:2530: yo 'sau tava pratyanīko rājā kenāpi prayojanenāraṇyam anupraviśya tāpasanepathyāvacchādito daurātmyaṃ kim apy ārebhe |
T09gopjatmu:2531: sa eṣa mayā balātkāraṃ tvatpriyacikīrṣayā baddhvā mīna iva sphurann ānītas tad atra devaḥ pramāṇam iti |
T09gopjatmu:2532: atha sa rājā tat tasya pāpakarmaṇaḥ karmāsaṃbhāvayann avocad enam |
T09gopjatmu:2534: jetuṃ sāgaramekhalāṃ vasumatīṃ bāhudvitīyo 'py ayaṃ śaktaḥ śaktimatāṃ varaḥ karikaravyālambibāhudrumaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2535: tvaṃ śakto 'sya parābhavaṃ katham are kartuṃ bṛhadvakṣasaḥ tat tvaṃ brūhi parābhavanti na mṛgāḥ siṃhaṃ sphuratkesaram || GoSd_66 ||
T09gopjatmu:2537: dhik tvām iti ca nirbhartsitaḥ kopakaluṣayā dṛṣṭyā tena rājñā parāṃ vrīḍām āpannaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2538: svayam eva vimucya bandhanāni kṣitipaḥ so 'tha yathāsukhaṃ nṛparṣim upaveśya tam āsane mahārhe bahumānānatavigraho jagāda |
T09gopjatmu:2540: prathayanti surāsurapradhānā bahumānaślatham ānataiḥ śirobhiḥ || GoSd_67
T09gopjatmu:2541: yadi rañjayituṃ prajāḥ samartho nṛpa rājety abhidhānasaṃniveśaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2542: guṇaratnanidhe tvam eva rājā viguṇo rañjayituṃ jagan na śaktaḥ || GoSd_68
T09gopjatmu:2543: anuśādhi yathā purā puraṃ svaṃ vayam ājñāpravaṇā bhavadvidhānām |
T09gopjatmu:2544: vinayād vyasanaṃ ca naḥ kṣamethāḥ skhalati proṣitalocanaḥ same 'pi ||
T09gopjatmu:2545: jātaprasādam atha taṃ nṛpatiṃ viditvā pātrīkṛtaṃ sucaritasya sa bodhisattvaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2546: śiṣyaṃ vinītam iva gauravabhāranamraṃ provāca nīlajaladastanayitnughoṣaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2547: āyur nṛṇām acirakālavināśi tāvat taptopalodaraniṣikta ivāmbubinduḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2548: saṅgāḥ priyaiḥ saha sadaiva viyogatiktāḥ saṃpattayo vipariṇāmaviṣāviṣahyāḥ
T09gopjatmu:2550: naikāntarāyavirasaṃ sabhayaṃ savairaṃ rājyaṃ pramādavadhabandhanimittabhūtam || GoSd_72 ||
T09gopjatmu:2551: tasmād vipākamadhurāṇi kuruṣva nityaṃ karmāṇi sajjanamanovinibandhanāni |
T09gopjatmu:2552: śokāśrukātaramukhās tu vipākakāle yeṣāṃ bhavanti puruṣāḥ prajahīhi tāni ||
T09gopjatmu:2553: nārtho rājyasukhaiḥ punar mama calai riktair anāśvāsikair vairāyāsaviṣādadainyakalahadvāraiḥ parapratyayaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2554: utkaṇṭhāṃ janayanti me kṣitidharāḥ saṃsaktadhārādharāḥ puṣpālambakadambapādapavanaśyāmopakaṇṭhāḥ śivāḥ || GoSd_74 ||
T09gopjatmu:2556: apaharati balān me mānasaṃ kānanāntakṣitir uparatarājyaprārthanāvipralambham || GoSd_75 ||
T09gopjatmu:2557: sthiravanagamanāśayaṃ viditvā nṛpatir asāv atha taṃ viśuddhasattvam |
T09gopjatmu:2558: apahṛtahṛdayo guṇais tadiyair vanagamanābhimukhaḥ kilāvatasthe || GoSd_76
T09gopjatmu:2559: avagamitamanāś ca bodhisattvaḥ kṣitipatinā vinayānatena tena |
T09gopjatmu:2560: uparataviṣayaspṛho 'pi ceto vanagamanād vinivartayāṃ babhūva || GoSd_77 ||
T09gopjatmu:2562: munaya iva vanāntavāsanimnāḥ praśamarasaikavihāriṇo bhavanti || GoSd_78 ||
T09gopjatmu:2563: bhavana iva vane 'pi sādhavas te jagadudayaikanibandhanaprayogāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2564: svatanum api parārtham utsṛjanti praṇayijanapraṇayaṃ na khaṇḍayanti ||
T09gopjatmu:2565: ata iha bhavanaṃ vanaṃ ca tulyaṃ jagadupajīvyavibhūtivistarāṇām |
T09gopjatmu:2568: dhanaṃ rājā sa viprāya vāñchitātyadhikaṃ dadau || GoSd_81 ||
T09gopjatmu:2569: tasyāścaryam udāradharmasuratiṃ cākarṇya viproditaṃ tyaktvā vairavikāraduḥsahataraṃ krodhābhidhānaṃ viṣam |
T09gopjatmu:2570: dhṛtvā maulim ivonnate ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ – – – ⏑ rājā svayaṃ cakre taccaraṇāmbujapraṇayinīm uṣṇīṣamālāṃ kṣaṇāt || GoSd_82 ||
T09gopjatmu:2571: tasmin gate nijapuraṃ vinayaprapanne saṃprāpya rājyam arihīnam udārapuṇyaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2573: caritam atigatopamānaśobhaṃ na hi vibhavo 'sty anugantum īśvarāṇām |
T09gopjatmu:2574: mama kṛpaṇamates tathāpi caitat kṛtam atisāhasam ātmano hitāya || GoSd_84
T09gopjatmu:2575: kuśalam upacitaṃ kṛpātmakānāṃ caritam idaṃ vinibadhya yan mayādya |
T09gopjatmu:2576: bhavatu bhuvanaśāntaye tad āśu jvalatu tathāgataśāsanaṃ tataś ca ||
T09gopjatmu:2580: Cf. Michael Hahn. Der grosse Legendenkranz Mahajjātakamālā. Wiesbaden 195
T09gopjatmu:2586: naparidyūtahṛdayena sarvalokātiśayināpi mahimnā kevalaṃ puṇyānām avandhyaphalam āviṣkurvann amarapuranivāsināṃ cānugrahāya ||
T09gopjatmu:2587: jagad dṛṣṭvānantavyasanakuliśāpātavihataṃ na sa svarge reme prakṛtiramaṇīye 'pi bhagavān |
T09gopjatmu:2588: tadā hy enaṃ sā dhīr hṛdi tudati niḥsaṅgam aniśaṃ parārthaprāgbhārā paramavidhurā svāduvidhurā akṛtakuśalavyāpārānāṃ svabhūtinibandhanaṃ kṛpaṇamanasāṃ – – yad vā mano bahu manyate |
T09gopjatmu:2589: svacaritapariprāptaiśvaryaṃ jagaddhitakāriṇā na viṣayasukheṣv āsthaṃ ceto mahaty api rakṣyate sa kadā cij jambūdvīpam avalokayan dadarśa [!] evaṃ lokam aśakyapratīkāravyādhiduḥkhopaplutaṃ viṣamavirasakṛtavaidyasāmarthyaṃ samaraṇam āvarjja(?)vyavasāyaviklavaṃ romanthamānam iva piśitāśanair
T09gopjatmu:2591: kṛtāntakarmānta iva pravṛttas tadā sa rogāntarakalpatulyaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2597: rūkṣasthūlaśirāpratānajaṭilatvaksnāyuśeṣāśrayāḥ ke cit pūrvakṛtaṃ ninindur aśubhaṃ karmābhisaṃdhisthiram kvathitapiśitarandhraprodvamatpūyadhārā malinavikṛtadehāḥ ke cid aprekṣaṇīyāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2599: saṃśuṣkādharakaṇṭhatāluvivarās tṛṣṇāgninā dāhinā rūkṣakṣāmavidāritānanapuṭāḥ pretā ivāyāsinaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2600: āmattālikuloddhatotpalavanacchannāmbuviṣyandināṃ vīkṣantaḥ sarasāṃ payāṃsi viviśuḥ ke cit kṛtāntālayam || GoŚv_7 ||
T09gopjatmu:2602: anye tu klamaśithilāśrayā rujānām ājagmur nilayanatāṃ prabandhinīnām ||
T09gopjatmu:2606: krūrārāvaiḥ purabalibhujāṃ maṇḍalaiḥ saṃpatadbhir vyāvṛttāsyā vipadam avaśāḥ pratyapadyanta tīvrām || GoŚv_9 ||
T09gopjatmu:2607: tasya tad atidāruṇam ālokya lokavyasanaṃ mahat kāruṇyam udapādi |
T09gopjatmu:2608: atha sa mahāsattvas tena sattvopadraveṇa vyathitamanāḥ sutarām abhivardhitānukampākampitaḥ pitevaikaputravyasanam asahamānaś cintām apede ||
T09gopjatmu:2609: itthaṃ gatānāṃ ka ivābhyupāyaḥ syād āmayocchittisukhaḥ prajānām |
T09gopjatmu:2610: apīha lokatrayabāndhavānāṃ tathāgatānām anṛṇo bhaveyam || GoŚv_10 ||
T09gopjatmu:2611: api nāma bhaven mama pratijñā sakalā lokahitaprayogasiddhyai |
T09gopjatmu:2612: api mānuṣajanmaduḥkhabhājo vyasanebhyaḥ parimokṣam aśnuvīran || GoŚv_11 ||
T09gopjatmu:2613: api nāma na bodhisattvanāmavyapadeśaṃ vitathaṃ samudvaheyam |
T09gopjatmu:2614: api sarvavidām agarhaṇīyāṃ dadhad ājñām animittavatsalānām || GoŚv_12 ||
T09gopjatmu:2615: bhavaduḥkhaśilīmukhakṣatānām api mateva piteva ca prajānām |
T09gopjatmu:2616: aham eva parāyaṇaṃ paraṃ syāṃ bhavaduḥkhāmburayapratīrabhūtaḥ || GoŚv_13
T09gopjatmu:2617: yāvad duḥkhābhibhūtaḥ praviśati na jano rogadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ kālāher āsyakośaṃ sakalajagadanugrāsasaṃbhogabhīmam
T09gopjatmu:2618: tāvad dvandvānurāgaṃ tridaśapurapatiśrīsukhaṃ projjhya ramyaṃ prāṇatyāgānurāgaṃ praṇayasukhakaraṃ bhūtabhṛtyai karomi || GoŚv_14 ||
T09gopjatmu:2621: kṛpālo duḥkhitān asmān parityajya kva yāsyasi |
T09gopjatmu:2622: viṣamasthān iva pitā vatsalo bālaputrakān || GoŚv_16 ||
T09gopjatmu:2624: asmān anāgasas tyaktvā mā yāsīḥ priyadarśana || GoŚv_17 ||
T09gopjatmu:2628: athāmarān aśrupariplutekṣaṇān sa sāntvayann ity avadan marutpatiḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:2629: na me na yuṣmāsv anurāgapeśalaṃ mano na cāyaṃ svahitodayādaraḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2630: vikāsinīnāṃ vipadāṃ mukhe sthitaṃ jagat paritrātum ayaṃ tu niścayaḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:2631: tad apramādaḥ kriyatāṃ sa eva vo dhruvaṃ samārtāyanatām upeṣyati |
T09gopjatmu:2632: visaṃvadanty eva samāgamāḥ priyair nipātaramyāḥ pariṇāmadāruṇāḥ || GoŚv_21
T09gopjatmu:2634: karmakṣayād vinipatanti surāḥ smarantaḥ saṃvartakānilahatā iva kalpavṛkṣāḥ
T09gopjatmu:2636: kṣārodakāṃ jvalanadarbhakukūlakūlāṃ nighnāḥ punar yadi ca vaitaraṇīṃ bhajante || GoŚv_23 ||
T09gopjatmu:2637: ko nāma teṣu matimān svamano nidadhyād utkṣepaṇīyakusumāvayavopameṣu |
T09gopjatmu:2640: sākaṃ priyābhir anubhūya sukhāni bhūyas tīkṣṇāsipattravanamadhyagatā bhavanti || GoŚv_25 ||
T09gopjatmu:2642: yad dhīndriyārthaparibhogasukhāni tasmād yatnaṃ surāḥ kuruta puṇyaparigrahāya || GoŚv_26 ||
T09gopjatmu:2643: edhobhir agnaya iva praśamaṃ vrajanti kāmāgnayo na viṣayair viṣapānakalpaiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2644: tasmād upāddhvam anavadyasukhābhirāmāṃ tāthāgatīṃ pratipadaṃ vyasanopaśāntyai || GoŚv_27 ||
T09gopjatmu:2647: praśāntyai bhūtānāṃ vayam api tiraścām anukṛtiṃ kariṣyāmo muktvā surabhavanasaṃbhogavasitām avicalapratibandho dīrghakālānuṣaṅgī mama jagadupakāraprārthanāsaṃniveśaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2648: sucaritaparipākasyeti dṛṣṭvā prasiddhiṃ na khalu kuśalavighnaṃ kartum arhanti santaḥ || GoŚv_29
T09gopjatmu:2649: atimānuṣam apy apāsya citraṃ mahimānaṃ kṛpayā vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2650: sa tu duḥkhakaro gatau tiraścāṃ paramāryaḥ pratisaṃdadhe mahātmā ||
T09gopjatmu:2652: prabhavā iva kalpapādapānām udayā lokahitāya sajjanānām || GoŚv_31 ||
T09gopjatmu:2654: manujātisukhaṃ samāpatantaṃ sthirasattvaṃ vinivartayāṃ babhūvuḥ || GoŚv_32
T09gopjatmu:2656: dayitāḥ karuṇaṃ tam īkṣamāṇāḥ śucisattvaṃ na nivartayāṃ babhūvuḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:2657: svajaneṣu na tasya sānukampaṃ na mano dakṣiṇa eva sa prakṛtyā |
T09gopjatmu:2658: avagamya garīyasīṃ tathāpi prakṛtiṃ śvā sa tathā cakāra sādhuḥ || GoŚv_34
T09gopjatmu:2659: sa hitāvahitā rujāturāṇāṃ himavanmerugurur guruḥ prajānām |
T09gopjatmu:2660: puruṣātiśayo guṇaprakarṣān niyataṃ dūrataraṃ samutpapāta || GoŚv_35 ||
T09gopjatmu:2661: tapobhir yāṃ dīrghair yamaniyamasaṃskāragurubhir vyavasyanti prāptuṃ salilaphalamūlānilabhujaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2662: vibhūtiṃ tām aindrīṃ tṛṇam iva parityajya kṛpayā tiraścāṃ sābhāgyaṃ sa jagadupakārārtham agamat śubhābhyāsād eva kṣapitakukṛtapratyayatayā tathāgatena prāptā bhavagatisamākṣepavaśitā |
T09gopjatmu:2663: yathecchaṃ yatrecchaṃ parahitasamādhānaviduṣas tathā hy abhūt janmavyasanaśamanāyaiva jagatām svakāmakārānuvidhāyinīm śriyam paṭāntalagnām hutabhukśikhām iva |
T09gopjatmu:2664: na marṣayanti vyasanāturān janān dṛṣṭvā mahāntaḥ karuṇānibandhanāḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:2665: tasyopapattisamakālam athoccacāra lokaṃ sphuran dhvanir iti śravaṇopakārī
T09gopjatmu:2666: yaḥ pāpy ayaṃ kuru puro bhajanaṃ ca tasya māṃsāsṛjau samupayujya śivaṃ bhajadhvam || GoŚv_39
T09gopjatmu:2667: śrutvātha dhvanim atimānuṣaṃ manuṣyāḥ sāṃhatyasvaritam upetya taṃ pradeśam |
T09gopjatmu:2668: ālokya kṣitidharapīvarātmabhāvaṃ taṃ sādhuṃ kṣamiṇam abhīyur udviṣāṇāḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:2669: āghūrṇasphuṭitakhaḍganiśātapāṇīn dṛṣṭvā tān abhipatato javena gatvā |
T09gopjatmu:2670: hāheti sphuṭavirasaṃ vilepur uccaiḥ pratyastapraśithilamaulayaḥ suraughāḥ
T09gopjatmu:2671: māṃ dṛṣṭvā ghanavipulāyatātmabhāvaṃ śrutvā vā surapuravāsināṃ pralāpān |
T09gopjatmu:2672: na kaś cit pratihatamānaso vasāsṛgmoko 'yaṃ kṣaṇam iti so 'bhavad vikārī
T09gopjatmu:2673: tān paurān suhṛda ivāvalokya tasya prītir yā manasi manasvino jṛmbhate |
T09gopjatmu:2674: tām eva kṣitidharasāradhīḥ sa mene paryāptaṃ phalam atiduṣkarasya tasya ||
T09gopjatmu:2677: ye dhvastāḥ parahitasaṃvidhānaśūnyās taddehāḥ kṣaṇabhidurā bhavaprabandhe
T09gopjatmu:2678: tān manye sa parigaṇayya śailatuṅgān cchuddhyaiva svatanum upādadhe mahātmā || GoŚv_45 ||
T09gopjatmu:2679: taṃ matvā vitatavikāram eva dhairyāt te tīkṣṇais tarum iva cicchiduḥ kuṭhāraiḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2680: niḥśaṅkā galitakṛpāśivair manobhiḥ so 'py āsīt tarur iva cāpanītamanyuḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:2681: tadraktavyatirekapāṭalāgrahastās tam khaḍgair araya ivāpare vicakruḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2682: so 'py āsīd abhimatakāryasaṃprasiddhyā prītyaiva sphuṭahṛdayo viśuddhakarmā || GoŚv_47 ||
T09gopjatmu:2683: susrāva kṣatajam athāsya khaḍgadhārāc chedebhyaḥ sphuṭakaradhīrapuṣpatāmram |
T09gopjatmu:2684: saṃprāptaghanasamaye vicitrasānor vindhyādrer jalam iva dhātunirjharebhyaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2685: cakṣāra vraṇamukhakandarebhyo yat tasya kṣatajam iva kṣatāśayasya |
T09gopjatmu:2687: tat tasya praṇidhibalāvalambinīnām āśānāṃ katham api pūraṇāt sucetaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2688: saṃprāpte 'py amrapure śarīrabhedāt prāmodyaṃ niratiśayopamaṃ babhāra ||
T09gopjatmu:2690: pratyantajvalanaśikhāvalīḍhasānoḥ kuñjeṣu drutam iva kāncanaṃ sumeroḥ ||
T09gopjatmu:2691: tasyograir yugapad itas tataś ca śastrair niḥśaṅkaṃ śakalitakomalāśrayāṅge |
T09gopjatmu:2692: vicchinne sahananiviṣṭaśuddhabuddheḥ prītyārdre manasi tirodadhe viṣādaḥ
T09gopjatmu:2693: paricayakṛtamārgās tasya raktapraṇālyo gagaṇaparikhabhūte cchidyamāne śarīre |
T09gopjatmu:2694: kṣitidharasaridoghā vistarāṇi pracakrur na ca manasi viṣādo nāpi khedo babhūva || GoŚv_53
T09gopjatmu:2696: tanuvivaratareṣu vyāḍasaṃghā vicerur na ca manasi viṣādo na ca khedo babhūva || GoŚv_54 ||
T09gopjatmu:2697: yad apahṛtam anāryais tasya māṃsaṃ śarīrād yadi tad apariśeṣaṃ piṇḍitaṃ syāt kathaṃ cit |
T09gopjatmu:2698: girim api sa sumeruṃ laṅghayen māṃsarāśir na ca manasi viṣado na ca khedo babhūva || GoŚv_55
T09gopjatmu:2699: kṣayam upayayur aṅgeṣv eva śastrāṇi tasya prakṛtimṛduṣu sādhor akṣatādhyāśayasya |
T09gopjatmu:2700: abhirucitaparārthaprītisaṃbhogaśānte na ca manasi viṣādo na ca khedo babhūva || GoŚv_56 ||
T09gopjatmu:2701: ye cāsya raktair vililepur aṅgā te rejire rogaviṣādamuktāḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2702: ye cāpi raktāni papuḥ sarogās te sarvalokāḥ pupuṣur virogāḥ || GoŚv_57 ||
T09gopjatmu:2703: janam apagatarogaṃ vīkṣamāṇasya harṣo manasi bhuvanabandhor labdhagādho babhūva |
T09gopjatmu:2704: piśitam anupayogaṃ vīkṣamāṇasya bhūyo 'py abhavad aratidolaṃ cañcalaṃ
T09gopjatmu:2707: kāyaḥ sa tasya vikṛtaḥ kṛtaniścayasya reje javākusumarāśir ivābhracumbī ||
T09gopjatmu:2708: vicchidyamānaḥ suniśātaśastrais tad duḥkham ekāśrayam īkṣamāṇaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2709: sukhena duḥkhaṃ sa nirācakāra labdhvā paratrātmani caikamatyam || GoŚv_60
T09gopjatmu:2711: upadigdhadhiyo yayā manuṣyāḥ pitṛbhūteṣv api sādhuṣu skhalanti || GoŚv_61
T09gopjatmu:2712: etasya māṃsaṃ bubhuje kṛpālor yo yaḥ sa sa vyādhim apācakāra |
T09gopjatmu:2713: krameṇa kṛcchraṃ jagad uttatāra vipatsamudraṃ tad anena kṛtsnam || GoŚv_62
T09gopjatmu:2714: atha sarva eva loko vigatanikhilarogopasargas tasmin mahāsattve samupajātapremagauravabahumānaḥ praṇamya śvānaṃ bodhisattvam abravīt ||
T09gopjatmu:2715: aho kṛpābhyāsaviśeṣabhadratā guṇeṣv aho bhaktir apetakalmaṣā |
T09gopjatmu:2716: aho parārthapratipattipeśalaṃ tavārya karmedam atītamānuṣam || GoŚv_63 ||
T09gopjatmu:2718: śubheṣv aho niścayaniścalaṃ mano manasvināṃ bodhipathānupātinām || GoŚv_64
T09gopjatmu:2719: aho batācintyam upāyakauśalam aho parārthe 'bhirater udāttatā |
T09gopjatmu:2720: acintyacaryātiśayāya sādhave namo 'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekabandhave || GoŚv_65
T09gopjatmu:2721: tvaṃ naḥ pitā yadi pitā tvam ivārthakāmaḥ śāstā tvam eva yadi dharmagurus tvam eva |
T09gopjatmu:2722: tvam daivataṃ yadi na taj janavādamātram ārtāyanaṃ tu jagataḥ paramaṃ tvam eva || GoŚv_66
T09gopjatmu:2725: atha bodhisattvaḥ samupajātaprasādamānasam avagamya tam enam abravīt ||
T09gopjatmu:2726: pīḍā mameyam iti naivam idaṃ pradhāryaṃ sattvārtham eva gaticakracalasya nityam |
T09gopjatmu:2727: pīḍā mamābhavad udīkṣya vipatparītān yuṣmān nirāmayasukhaṃ tv adhunā mano me || GoŚv_68 ||
T09gopjatmu:2728: kṛtyaṃ na me parahitād aparaṃ garīyaḥ saṃsāracārakanibandhanam etad eva |
T09gopjatmu:2729: tasmāt kukāryamalinām atilaṅghya caryāṃ matprītaye satatam ātmahitaṃ kurudhvam || GoŚv_69
T09gopjatmu:2730: lokān imān svakṛtakarmabhujo viditvā mṛtyor aparvaparuṣasya karodarasthān
T09gopjatmu:2731: pāpāny asahyaparitāpaphalodayāni prāṇātyaye 'pi parivarjayituṃ yatadhvam || GoŚv_70 ||
T09gopjatmu:2733: puṇyāni saṃcinuta matpratikārabuddhyā kalyāṇamitravacanaṃ hi na laṅghanīyam || GoŚv_71 ||
T09gopjatmu:2734: iti samanuśiṣya prāṇinas tān mahātmā niśitaparaśudhārājarjaraklāntadehaḥ |
T09gopjatmu:2735: avasitakaraṇīyaḥ paryudasyātmabhāvaṃ tam ativikṛtarūpaṃ svargam evāruroha
T09gopjatmu:2737: vigatajaladapaṅkavyomaparyantadīrghāḥ śaśina iva mayūkhā lokam uttārayanti
